T02TD1803E:57a-1: ts'ar+ya me l'a pa na pri d'i pam /
T02TD1803E:57a-3: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma /
T02TD1803E:57a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:57a-5: dngos med rnam dag nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:57a-6: ma lus tshig med yi ge bral la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:57a-7: 'das dang ma byon kun du son la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:57a-8: kun du ma lus thams cad stong la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:57a-9: rdo rje theg pa 'di la sngags kyi sgor spyod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD1803E:57a-10: slob dpon gsang sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba dang /
T02TD1803E:57a-11: nang la mchog tu gzhol ba ste /
T02TD1803E:57a-12: thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i don du /
T02TD1803E:57a-13: mdo sde dang rgyud dang rtogs pa dag las yang dag par gsungs pa'i lung gi tshig rnam par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshig snyan cing rgya che ba du ma dag bltas nas tshigs su bcad pa dang rkyang pa la sogs pa sgra spas pa rnams dang spel zhing rab tu spel ba rnams kyi rgyud yang dag pa rnams las btus te /
T02TD1803E:57a-14: byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i thabs kyi yan lag mar me lta bu byed pa dag sngon byung bar gyur pa ni mi rigs so //
T02TD1803E:57a-16: rdzogs ldan dang gsum ldan dang gnyis ldan gyi dus na ni 'jig rten pa rnams tshe dang nad med pa phun sum tshogs shing /
T02TD1803E:57a-18: tshul khrims la spyod pa la sogs pa yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni bstan bcos la gnas shing yongs su tshol bas de kho na nyid shes pa la mngon par zhugs shing tshig rgya che ba la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1803E:57a-19: spas pa'i sgra'i sgo nas de kho na nyid ston la /
T02TD1803E:57a-20: de rnams kyis kyang khong du chud pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:57a-21: da ltar ni rtsod pa'i dus te 'jig rten pa rnams tshe dang nad med pa dang /
T02TD1803E:57a-22: phun sum tshogs pa dman zhing g-yo dang sgyu dang dregs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:57b-1: shes rab zhan cing log par lta bas las ngan pa la sogs pa la dga' bas ji srid du tshig rgya che ba la sogs pa spas pa'i sgra'i don rnams la nges par mi dga' bas de kho na nyid tshol bar mi byed do //
T02TD1803E:57b-2: de'i phyir na dang po'i bstan bcos yongs su tshol ba spangs pas de kho na nyid mi rtogs shing dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las la mngon par gzhol bas dus byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:57b-3: de bas na thar pa thob par 'dod pa rnams la dgos pa med par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:57b-4: tshig snyan pa dang rgya che ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi sgo la gnas pa'i sgra rnams ni gzings dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T02TD1803E:57b-5: / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ji skad du don gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'i sgra ji bzhin par ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1803E:57b-6: don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas bdag gi slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi man ngag las bskyed pa'i go rims kyis rdzogs pa'i go rims kyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas 'dus byas pa dang 'dus ma byas pa'i slob ma rnams kyi thun mong du bshad pa'i sgra'i sgo nas /
T02TD1803E:57b-7: sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:57b-8: phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:57b-9: bdag gi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:57b-10: chos kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:57b-11: lha'i de kho na nyid de /
T02TD1803E:57b-12: go rims rnam pa lnga rnam par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdo sde dang /
T02TD1803E:57b-14: rtog pa rnams bsres nas bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:57b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde la sogs pa bshad pa'i gsung rab kun las /
T02TD1803E:57b-16: bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang //
T02TD1803E:57b-20: bcom ldan 'das la lha mo bzhis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:57b-21: thub pa chen po'i chos rnams kyi //
T02TD1803E:57b-22: phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la //
T02TD1803E:57b-23: gang gis de nyid mi shes pa //
T02TD1803E:57b-24: de yi thams cad 'bras bu med //
T02TD1803E:57b-26: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:57b-27: de kho na nyid mi shes par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na /
T02TD1803E:57b-28: yang de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid gsung rab kyi sgo nas nyan par 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:57b-29: gang gi phyir theg pa chen po pa dang /
T02TD1803E:57b-30: rtog ge pa la sogs pa rnams ni don 'di nyid la gnas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pas de kho na nyid rtogs par bgyid na /
T02TD1803E:58a-1: bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:58a-2: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:58a-3: yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1803E:58a-5: bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba de ji lta bu lags /
T02TD1803E:58a-7: gang mi slu ba zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:58a-9: mi slu ba zhes bya ba de ji lta bu lags /
T02TD1803E:58a-11: shin tu yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin de ni mi slu ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:58a-13: yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin ces pa de gang lags /
T02TD1803E:58a-15: gang bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1803E:58a-17: bcom ldan 'das bden pa gnyis zhes bgyi ba de gang lags /
T02TD1803E:58a-19: dang po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
T02TD1803E:58a-20: gnyis pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02TD1803E:58a-22: bcom ldan 'das bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags /
T02TD1803E:58a-23: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:58a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud las bka' stsal te /
T02TD1803E:58a-25: phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:58a-26: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi gnas don dam pa'i bden pa ji lta bu lags /
T02TD1803E:58a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:58a-28: gsang ba'i bdag po chos thams cad ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang /
T02TD1803E:58a-29: 'gro ba rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams te /
T02TD1803E:58a-30: de yang don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pas gnas med pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa'i bden pa ni bdag med pa zil gyis mi non pa thams cad stong pa ste /
T02TD1803E:58a-34: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid /
T02TD1803E:58a-37: lus dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba /
T02TD1803E:58a-46: dbu ma yang ma yin pa 'di ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02TD1803E:58a-47: de bas na de ni mchog tu zab pa dang /
T02TD1803E:58b-0: rgyu rkyen gyis 'byung @58b ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
T02TD1803E:58b-1: de ni ji srid du rmi lam dang /
T02TD1803E:58b-3: gzugs brnyan ltar snang ba dang ldan pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1803E:58b-4: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i rgyur gyur pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T02TD1803E:58b-5: de gnyis zung du 'brel par 'jug pa'i rim pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1803E:58b-6: dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
T02TD1803E:58b-7: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:58b-8: bdag cag lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thog ma med pa nas phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mngon par zhen pas yod pa dang med pa dang /
T02TD1803E:58b-12: gnyis ka ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:58b-14: med pa yang ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:58b-15: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bag chags kyi rgyus rnam par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyi ting nge 'dzin la slob pa na go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bgyi'am /
T02TD1803E:58b-16: yang na bla ma'i man ngag tsam gyis de dag skad cig tsam gyis so sor snang bar bgyi /
T02TD1803E:58b-17: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:58b-18: rim gyis 'jug pas bslab par bya'i cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:58b-19: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang la'ang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:58b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang gsol ba btab pa /
T02TD1803E:58b-21: bcom ldan 'das rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud cig car ram /
T02TD1803E:58b-23: ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:58b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga / blo gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud ni rim gyis 'jug pas rnam par dag ste cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:58b-26: blo gros chen po shing aa mra'i 'bras bu ni rim gyis smin par 'gyur gyi cig car ni sa yin no //
T02TD1803E:58b-27: blo gros chen po de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud kyang rim gyis rnam par dag ste cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:58b-28: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
T02TD1803E:59a-0: rdza mkhan gyi snod rnams ni rim gyis byed kyi cig car ni ma yin @59a * //
T02TD1803E:59a-2: / blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud kyang rim gyis rnam par sbyong ste cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:59a-3: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste sa chen po las rtsva dang /
T02TD1803E:59a-5: sman dang nags tshal rnams rim gyis 'jug pas skye'i cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:59a-6: blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis sbyong ste cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:59a-7: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste bzhad gad dang /
T02TD1803E:59a-12: rol mo dag la mkhas pa ni rim gyis 'byung gi cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:59a-13: blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis rnam par sbyong ste cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:59a-14: rim pa 'di nyid ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las kyang gsal bar gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:59a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1803E:59a-16: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis par dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la slob pa lags /
T02TD1803E:59a-17: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T02TD1803E:59a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD1803E:59a-19: blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon nam /
T02TD1803E:59a-20: 'phong gi slob ma ni thog mar ba lang gi ko ba la phog par byed do //
T02TD1803E:59a-21: gang gi tshe ba lang gi ko ba la lobs pa de'i tshe shing leb la phog par byed do //
T02TD1803E:59a-22: gang gi tshe shing leb la lobs pa de'i tshe 'ben la phog par byed do //
T02TD1803E:59a-23: gang gi tshe 'ben la lobs pa de'i tshe de'i dbyu gu la phog par byed do //
T02TD1803E:59a-24: dgang gi tshe dbyu gu la lobs pa de'i tshe skra brgya la phog par byed do //
T02TD1803E:59a-25: gang gi tshe skra brgya la lobs pa de'i tshe skra bcu la phog par byed do //
T02TD1803E:59a-26: gang gi tshe skra bcu la lobs pa de'i tshe skra gcig la phog par byed do //
T02TD1803E:59a-27: gang gi tshe skra gcig la lobs pa de'i tshe skras mtshon pa la phog par byed do //
T02TD1803E:59b-0: gang gi tshe sgras mtshon pa la phog pa de'i tshe mi 'tshor bar phog @59b par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:59b-1: gang gi tshe mi 'tshor bar phog pa de'i tshe 'phong slob pa mthar phyin pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:59b-2: de 'dod na nub mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na yang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dang gang gi sgra grag pa da dang der lhun gyis grub cing mi 'chor ba nyid du mda' 'gro'o //
T02TD1803E:59b-3: sgras mtshon pa la phog par byed pa lobs pas phyis gang du yang mi slob ste /
T02TD1803E:59b-5: sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir phog par bya ba thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:59b-6: blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyis chos gang la yang bslab par mi bya'o //
T02TD1803E:59b-8: ting nge 'dzin de nyid la sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi chos thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:59b-9: yang tshul 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i theg pa la gnas pa'i dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod pas kyang rim pa 'di nyid kyis bslab par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:59b-10: de'i rim pa yang 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:59b-11: thog ma nyid du ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la slob bo //
T02TD1803E:59b-12: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la lobs par gyur pa de'i tshe theg pa sar pa dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob bo //
T02TD1803E:59b-13: gang gi tshe theg pa gsar la dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la lobs pa de'i tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la slob bo //
T02TD1803E:59b-14: gang gi tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la lobs pa'i de'i tshe las dang po po'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:59b-15: gang gi tshe las dang po ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de'i tshe rigs brgya'i dbye ba la 'jug go //
T02TD1803E:59b-16: gang gi tshe rigs brgya'i dbye ba la mkhas pas lus rnam par dben pa shes pa de'i tshe sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:59b-17: lus rnam par dben pa la gnas nas /
T02TD1803E:59b-18: a'a li k'a li'i sgo nas ngag rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
T02TD1803E:59b-19: gang gi tshe rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim gyis srog dang rtsol ba shes par gyur pa de'i tshe gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:59b-20: dag rnam par dben pa la gnas nas rang bzhin gyis snang ba'i ba'i rim gyis sems rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
T02TD1803E:60a-0: gang gi tshe rang bzhin gyis snang ba la rlung gi bzhon pa'i rab tu dbye bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du @60a * //
T02TD1803E:60a-1: lobs pa de'i tshe sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:60a-2: sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa la gnas nas sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:60a-3: gang gi tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba thob bo //
T02TD1803E:60a-4: gang gi tshe dbang bskur ba thob pa de'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas stong pa chen po bco brgyad kyi rim gyis don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug go //
T02TD1803E:60a-5: gang gi tshe ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:60a-6: gang gi tshe ye shes kyis rim gyis ldang ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bden pa gnyis la gnyis su med pa'i rnam pas bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la lobs par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:60a-7: gang gi tshe rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni phyis chos gang la yang mi slob po //
T02TD1803E:60a-9: sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir te ji ltar 'phong gi slob dpon ni sgras mtshon pa la phog par byed par gnas pas phyis gang du yang mi slob po //
T02TD1803E:60a-11: sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir de'i sngon gyi 'phen shugs kyi stobs kyis mngon du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:60a-12: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa'i ni phyis gang la yang slob par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:60a-13: sngon shin tu legs par bslabs pa'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:60a-14: de'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub dag ni lhun gyis grub pa nyid du mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:60a-15: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par byed pas kyang rim gyis 'jug pas bslab par bya'i cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:60a-16: de bas na lus rnam par dben pa med par ngag rnam par dben pa shes par mi nus so //
T02TD1803E:60a-17: ngag rnam par dben pa dang bral bas ni sems rnam par dben pa rtogs par mi nus so //
T02TD1803E:60a-18: sems kyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin med par kun rdzob kyi bden pa mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so //
T02TD1803E:60b-0: kun rdzob kyi bden pa rtogs pa dang bral @60b bas ni don dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so //
T02TD1803E:60b-1: don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs pa med par ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so //
T02TD1803E:60b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas rim gyi 'jug par bslab par bya'i cig car ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:60b-3: rim gyis 'jug pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la bslabs pas cig car rang gi rgyud rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:60b-4: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang lang kar gshegs po'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:60b-5: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
T02TD1803E:60b-6: me long gi nang du gzugs kyi gzugs su snang ba thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pas cig car snang ngo //
T02TD1803E:60b-7: de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par mi rtog cing snang ba med pa'i spyod yul rnams cig car rnam par sbyong ngo //
T02TD1803E:60b-8: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
T02TD1803E:60b-9: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'od zar rnams kyis gzugs su snang ba thams cad cig car mngon par byed do //
T02TD1803E:60b-10: de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags dang bral ba rnams las rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul dang spyod yul yang dag par ston to //
T02TD1803E:60b-12: sems can dang po'i las can rnams //
T02TD1803E:60b-13: dam pa'i don la 'jug pa la //
T02TD1803E:60b-14: thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1803E:60b-15: skas kyi rim pa lta bur gzhag / ces bya ba'i rim pa lnga'i go rims dang bral bas ni rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtogs par mi nus so zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:60b-16: spyod pa bsdus pa las the tshom yongs su gcod pa ste le'u dang po'o /
T02TD1803E:60b-18: // rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:60b-19: bcom ldan 'das dang por rang gi lus rnam par dben pa la ji ltar slob par bgyi /
T02TD1803E:60b-20: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:60b-21: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:60b-22: lus rnam par dben pa rgya cher khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:60b-23: de la khams bzhi pos lus mngon par bskyed pa las lus su grub pa 'di ni spungs pa bzhin du gnas te /
T02TD1803E:61a-31: yan lag la sogs pa tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:61a-32: yang de la phung po lnga dang /
T02TD1803E:61a-36: shes pa lnga ni spungs pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD1803E:61a-41: mon sran sde'u mang po la spungs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:61a-42: de bzhin du lus kyi yan lag dang /
T02TD1803E:61a-43: nying lag tu gtogs pa tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:61a-44: khams rnams tshogs pa las shes rab dang /
T02TD1803E:61a-50: nyon mongs pa'i rgyun la ni bsags pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:61a-51: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs pa spungs pa ni nye bar dmigs par mi 'gyur te gnas med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:61a-53: bzang skyong gis zhus pa las kyang /
T02TD1803E:61a-54: lus 'di la rnam par shes pa gang na yang mi gnas te /
T02TD1803E:61a-55: rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:61a-56: bzang skyong de'i phyir nyon cig bden pa ma mthong bas ni rnam par shes pa mi mthong ste /
T02TD1803E:61a-57: de ni lag mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag pa bzhin du mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1803E:61a-58: yang 'di ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams thog ma med pa nas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa rnams kyis ni da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan te /
T02TD1803E:61a-59: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:61a-60: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
T02TD1803E:61a-61: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1803E:61a-62: rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang //
T02TD1803E:61a-63: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog //
T02TD1803E:61a-64: sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin //
T02TD1803E:61a-65: chu yi khams ni m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1803E:61b-0: me yi khams ni gos @61b dkar mo //
T02TD1803E:61b-1: sgrol ma rlung du rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1803E:61b-2: gzugs dang sgra sogs sngags pa yis //
T02TD1803E:61b-3: lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom //
T02TD1803E:61b-5: yang phung po la sogs pa de dag re re zhing yang lnga lngar rnam par phyed brgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:61b-7: rigs ni rnam pa brgyar bstan te //
T02TD1803E:61b-8: mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga //
T02TD1803E:61b-9: lus dang ngag yid sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1803E:61b-10: gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1803E:61b-11: zhes gsungs pas da la dang po nyid du rigs brgya'i rab tu dbye ba bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:61b-12: de la gzugs kyi phung po'i tshogs ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:61b-13: de yang rnam par lngar phye ba la /
T02TD1803E:61b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:61b-15: de la ring po dang thung du la sogs phyi dang nang dang gnyis ga'i dbyibs kyi gzungs ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:61b-16: bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis so //
T02TD1803E:61b-17: phyi nang gi sngon po la sogs pa kha dog lnga'i gzugs ni snang ba mtha' yas kyis so //
T02TD1803E:61b-18: phyi dang nang gi zla ba dang /
T02TD1803E:61b-19: nyi ma la sogs pa snang ba'i rnam pa ni don yod grub pas so //
T02TD1803E:61b-20: rang rig pa tsam 'ba' zhig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD1803E:61b-21: gzugs kyi phung po rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:61b-22: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:61b-23: tshor ba'i phung po'i tshogs ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD1803E:61b-24: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:61b-25: de la 'dus pa dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mi bskyod pas so //
T02TD1803E:61b-26: bad kan dang rlung las skyes pa'i tshor ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis so //
T02TD1803E:61b-27: bde ba'i tshor ba ni 'od dpag med kyis so //
T02TD1803E:61b-28: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni don yod grub pas so //
T02TD1803E:61b-29: chor ba mnyam pa nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD1803E:61b-30: tshor ba'i phung po rnam pa lnga bshad do //
T02TD1803E:61b-31: snang ba mtha' yas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:61b-32: 'du shes kyi phung po'i tshogs ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1803E:62a-0: 'di ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams skyes pa rnams kyi 'dus byas pa nyid kyang rkang gnyis dang rkang med @62a * //
T02TD1803E:62a-1: la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye na ming tha dad pa'i dngos por yod pa rnams la de rnam par shes pas nye bar bzung nas yongs su gcod par byed la mtshan ma de'i 'du shes kyi phung po zhes bya bar tha dad par rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:62a-2: 'du shes de yang de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:62a-3: de la rkang gnyis pa'i 'du shes ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-4: rkang bzhi pa'i 'du shes ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-5: rkang med kyi 'du shes ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-6: rkang mngas kyi 'du shes ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-7: mi g-yo zhing mi 'gyur ba'i 'du shes ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste 'du shes kyi phung po rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:62a-8: don yod grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:62a-9: 'du byed kyi phung po'i tshogs ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-10: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa ldas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:62a-11: lus kyi 'du byed ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-12: ngag gi 'du byed ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-13: yid kyi 'du byed ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-14: khams gsum gyi 'du byed ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-15: thar pa'i 'du byed ni don yod grub pas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD1803E:62a-16: 'du byed kyi phung po rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:62a-17: mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang dub byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:62a-19: don yongs su gcod pa dang /
T02TD1803E:62a-20: don khong du chud pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-21: rnam par shes pa la gnas pas kyang phyi'i don rnam par rab tu brtags la /
T02TD1803E:62a-22: phyi'i don gyis kyang rnam par shes par brtags te /
T02TD1803E:62a-23: de ltar phan tshun ltos pas shes pa dang /
T02TD1803E:62a-24: shes par bya ba gnyis grub bo //
T02TD1803E:62a-25: rnam par shes pa de yang rnam pa lngar phye ba la de bzhin gshegs pa ldas byin gyis brlabs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-26: de la rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i tshogs ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1803E:62a-27: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-28: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-29: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:62a-30: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-0: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mi bskyod pas byin gyis @62b brlabs ba ste /
T02TD1803E:62b-1: rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam pa ldar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:62b-2: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
T02TD1803E:62b-3: sangs rgyas ldar ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1803E:62b-4: zhes bya ba'i mdo'i don bshad zin to //
T02TD1803E:62b-5: khams rnam pa bzhi'i dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:62b-7: gang lci ba nyid dang sra ba nyid de /
T02TD1803E:62b-8: de yang las ni brtan pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-10: gang gsher ba nyid dang rlan pa nyid de /
T02TD1803E:62b-11: de yang las ni sdud pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-12: de la me'i khams gang zhe na /
T02TD1803E:62b-13: gang dro ba nyid dang yongs su smin pa nyid de de yang las ni skems pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-14: de la rlung gi khams gang zhe na gang brkyang ba dang /
T02TD1803E:62b-18: las ni yang zhing g-yo ba'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-19: de ltar theg pa chen po'i rim pas khams rnam pa bzhi'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par bzhag nas /
T02TD1803E:62b-20: da ni tha mal pa'i nga rgyal rnam par spang bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje theg pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du bya ste /
T02TD1803E:62b-21: de la sa'i khams kyi tshogs ni sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02TD1803E:62b-22: de yang khams rnam pa lngar phye ba la de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:62b-24: phyi sa dang mchin pa dang snying ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-25: sbu dang se na mo dang rnag dang snying ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-26: so dang pags pa dang sha dang snying ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-27: rgyus pa dang sha dang rtsib ma dang snying ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-28: dri ma dang rgyu ma dang mkhris pa dang snying ni mi bskyod pa ste ji skad du rdo rje phreng ba las kyang /
T02TD1803E:62b-29: snying ni lnga la nges gnas te //
T02TD1803E:62b-30: rgyud lngar rnam bar 'byung ba ni //
T02TD1803E:62b-31: rlung lnga dang ni ldan pa ru //
T02TD1803E:62b-32: 'dong pa lnga rnams spyod par byed //
T02TD1803E:62b-34: de bzhin du yang phyi rol gyi sa'i khams kyang rnam pa lngar dbye ste /
T02TD1803E:62b-35: de yang gling bzhi dang ni ri rab po //
T02TD1803E:62b-36: de la ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs ba'o ;
T02TD1803E:62b-37: / lus 'phags po ni mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-38: 'dzam bu gling ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-39: ba lang spyod ni 'od dpag med kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:62b-40: sgra mi snyan ni don yod grub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-2: m'a ma k'i'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:63a-3: de la chu'i khams kyi tshogs ni m'a ma k'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-4: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD1803E:63a-5: bad kan dang mchi ma ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-6: gcin ni mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-7: rdul ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-8: khrag ni 'od dpag med kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-9: kha chu ni don yod grub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-10: phyi rol gyi yang rnam pa ldar bltas te /
T02TD1803E:63a-11: de yang rgya mtsho'i chu ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-12: chu bo'i chu ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-13: bkod ma'i chu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-14: lteng ka'i chu ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-15: 'bab chu'i chu ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste chu'i khams rnam pa lngas bshad do //
T02TD1803E:63a-16: gos dkar mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:63a-17: me'i khams kyi tshogs ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-18: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD1803E:63a-19: mgo bo'i drod ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-20: snying ga'i drod ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-21: lte ba'i drod ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-22: yan lag thams cad kyi drod ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-23: lto ba'i drod ni don yod grub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o /
T02TD1803E:63a-24: phyi rol gyi yang rnam pa lngar bstan te /
T02TD1803E:63a-25: de la rgyun bzhag gi me ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-26: rdo las byung ba'i me ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-27: me shel las byung ba'i me ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o /
T02TD1803E:63a-28: shing las byung ba'i me ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-29: nags kyi me ni don yod par grub pas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD1803E:63a-30: me'i khams rnam pa lngas bshad do //
T02TD1803E:63a-31: sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:63a-32: de yang rlung gi khams kyi tshogs ni sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-33: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:63a-34: de la srog ces bya ba snying la gnas pa ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-35: thur du sel ba zhes bya ba mdoms na gnas pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:63a-36: steng du rgyu ba zhes bya ba lkog mar gnas pa ni 'od dpag med kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:63b-0: me dang mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba lte bar @63b gnas pa ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63b-1: khyab byed ces bya ba tshigs thams cad la gnas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:63b-2: yang de rnams re re'i las bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:63b-3: dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni //
T02TD1803E:63b-4: srog dang rtsol ba rgyu ba dang //
T02TD1803E:63b-5: rtag pa'i dus su rgyu ba ni //
T02TD1803E:63b-6: srog ces bya ba yin par bshad //
T02TD1803E:63b-7: rlung dang gcin dang phyi sa dang //
T02TD1803E:63b-8: de bzhin du ni khu ba rnams //
T02TD1803E:63b-10: rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya //
T02TD1803E:63b-11: myang dang za dang bldag pa dang //
T02TD1803E:63b-13: gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas par //
T02TD1803E:63b-14: mnyam du gnas zhes bya ba yin //
T02TD1803E:63b-15: gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang //
T02TD1803E:63b-16: bza' dang myang sogs za ba ni //
T02TD1803E:63b-17: shes dang lhan cig 'byor ba dag / gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya //
T02TD1803E:63b-18: khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni //
T02TD1803E:63b-19: 'gro dang de bzhin ldog pa dang //
T02TD1803E:63b-20: tshigs rnams kun la khyab pas na //
T02TD1803E:63b-21: khyab byed ces ni bya bar bshad //
T02TD1803E:63b-22: phyi rol gyi yang rnam pa lngar blta ste //
T02TD1803E:63b-23: shar gyi rlung ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63b-24: lho'i rlung ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:63b-25: nub kyi rlung ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63b-26: byang gi rlung ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:63b-27: steng gi rlung ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste rlung gi khams rnam pa ldar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:63b-28: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di rnams ni gang du gcig yod pa der bzhi char yod de /
T02TD1803E:63b-29: de bas na 'di rnams ni phan sun ltos pa med par ngo bo nyid kyis rang grub pa ni med do //
T02TD1803E:63b-30: nam mkha' ni dbang po las 'das shing 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir 'byung ba chen po ma yin te /
T02TD1803E:63b-31: go 'byed par byed pas na nam mkha' ni dngos po thams cad la mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1803E:63b-32: sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin //
T02TD1803E:63b-33: chu yi khams ni m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1803E:63b-34: me ni gos dkar mo yin no //
T02TD1803E:63b-35: rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1803E:63b-36: zhes bya ba'i mdo'i tshig bshad zin to //
T02TD1803E:63b-37: da ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:63b-38: de la mig gi skye mched kyi tshogs ni sa'i snying po'i //
T02TD1803E:63b-39: de yang rnam pa lngar phye ba la de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:64a-0: de la mig gi 'bras bu'i nang @64a * //
T02TD1803E:64a-1: na rgun 'bru'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi mig gi dbang po de ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-2: mig 'bras dkar po'i rang bzhin ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-3: zur gyis lta ba'i gzugs ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-4: mig rnam par g-yo ba ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-5: gzugs gsum 'dzin pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te mig gi skye mched rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:64a-6: de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched kyi tshogs ni phyag na rdo rje ste /
T02TD1803E:64a-7: 'di la rna ba'i nang na gro ga gcus te bcad pa lta bu'i rnam pa'i rdul phra rab bsags pa'i gzugs can rna ba'i dbang po ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-8: rna ba'i rang bzhin ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-9: rna ba'i bu ga ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-10: rna ba'i rtsa ba ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-11: sgra gsum 'dzin pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te rna ba'i skye mched rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:64a-12: sna'i skye mched kyi tshogs ni nam mkha'i snying po ste /
T02TD1803E:64a-13: sna'i nang gi mig sman gyi thur ma phra ba lta bu'i rdul phra rab bsags pa'i gzugs can sna'i dbang po de ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-14: sna'i rang bzhin ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-15: nang gi dbus ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-16: sna bug ni don yod par grub pa'i'o//
T02TD1803E:64a-17: dri gsum 'dzin pa ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:64a-18: sna'i skye mched rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:64a-19: lce'i skye mched kyi tshogs ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
T02TD1803E:64a-20: de la rdul phra rab bsags pa'i gzugs can zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs lta bu'i lce'i dbang po ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-21: lce'i rang bzhin ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-22: lce'i rtsa ba ni chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-23: lce'i rtse mo ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-24: ro gsum 'dzin pa ni don yod par grub pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:64a-25: lce'i skye mched rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:64a-26: lus kyi skye mched kyi tshogs ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste /
T02TD1803E:64a-27: de la lus kyi rdul phra rab bsags pa'i ma lus pa'i gzugs kyi lus dbang po de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-28: rus pa'i rang bzhin ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-29: sha'i rang bzhin ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64a-30: pags pa'i rang bzhin ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64b-0: @64b reg pa gsum 'dzin pa ni mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:64b-1: lus kyi skye mched rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:64b-2: 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:64b-3: 'di na lus kyi nang na snang ba'i rnam par shes pa gsum po de ni yid kyi dbang po ste /
T02TD1803E:64b-4: dbang po thams cad kyi bdag po yin zhing so sor rang rig pa yin pas phyi'i yul ni med kyi chos kyi dbyings yul du byas nas sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim gyis bdag nyid rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lus pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1803E:64b-5: 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin bshad zin to //
T02TD1803E:64b-6: rdo rje skye mched nyi dag kyang //
T02TD1803E:64b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / ces bya ba'i mdo'i don bshad zin to //
T02TD1803E:64b-8: yul rnams lha mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas te bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:64b-9: rdo rje sgo zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las rlung bcu gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:64b-18: yang dag bar rgyu ba dang /
T02TD1803E:64b-21: de la srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga ni phung po lnga la brten te phung po'i bya ba rnams byed do //
T02TD1803E:64b-22: ldang zhing rgyu ba la sogs pa'i rlung lnga ni dbang po rnams la gnas nas phyi rol gyi bya ba rnams byed do //
T02TD1803E:64b-23: de la ldang zhing rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung mig gi skye mched la brten nas gzugs rnam pa lnga'i bya ba rdzogs par byed do //
T02TD1803E:64b-24: de yang snang ba dang sgrib g-yogs med pa dang /
T02TD1803E:64b-26: mig gi dbang po chogs pa dang ldan pa'i rgyus gzugs kyi yul rnams mthong ste /
T02TD1803E:64b-27: de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64b-28: 'gying ba ga dang rnam par rol ba dang ste ga pa'i gzugs ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64b-29: rjes su chags pa'i gzugs ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:64b-30: yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang btang snyoms kyi 'du shes can gyi gzugs ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:64b-31: bya ba thams cad sgrub pa'i gzugs ni don yod par grub pas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD1803E:64b-32: gzugs kyi yul rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:65a-0: rnam par rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung ni rna @65a * //
T02TD1803E:65a-1: ba'i skye mched la brten nas sgra rnam pa lnga'i bya ba byed de /
T02TD1803E:65a-2: de la rna ba'i nang gi sgra dang mgo dang skra'i sgra ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-3: glu dang rgyun gyi sgra ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-4: rkan dang mchu dang dag gi sgra ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-5: nags tshal dang chu bo dang se gol dang thal mo dang rdza rda la sogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra ni don yod par grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-6: yi ge h'um gi zhi ba dang drag po'i sgra ni mi bskyod pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin te sgra'i yul rnam pa ldar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:65a-7: yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung ni skye mched la brten nas dri rnam pa lnga'i bya ba byed do //
T02TD1803E:65a-8: de la dri ma lus pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-9: yan lag thams cad kyi dri ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-10: dri gsum gyi bye brag 'dzin pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-11: ro'i dri ni don yod par grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-12: dri mi zad pa ni mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs pa ste dri'i skye mched rnam pa lngar bshad do//
T02TD1803E:65a-13: rab tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung ni lce'i skye mched la brten nas ro rnam pa lnga skyong bar byed de //
T02TD1803E:65a-14: de la ro ma ngar ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-15: ro bska ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-16: lan tshva'i ro ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-17: ro kha ba ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-18: ro tsha ba dang skyur ba la sogs pa'i ro drug gi bye brag ni don yod par grub par byin gyis brlabs pa yin te ro'i skye mched rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:65a-19: nges par rgyu ba zhes bya ba ni lus kyi skye mched la brten nas stobs 'gyed pa la sogs pa stobs dang spro ba rnams te /
T02TD1803E:65a-20: de yang reg bya'i bya ba lnga rjes su skyong bar byed do //
T02TD1803E:65a-21: de la stan gcig la gnas pa'i reg bya ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-22: 'khyud pa'i reg bya ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-23: 'o byed pa'i reg bya ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-24: rngub pa'i reg bya ni don yod par grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65a-25: bha ga dang lidha'i sbyor ba'i reg bya chags pa dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1803E:65a-26: dbu ma'i chags pa'i ngo bo nyid nye bar dmigs pa ni mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs pa ste reg bya'i yul rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:65a-27: gzugs sgra la sogs sngags pa yis //
T02TD1803E:65a-28: lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom //
T02TD1803E:65a-29: zhes bya ba'i mdo'i don bshad zin to //
T02TD1803E:65a-30: ye shes lnga'i dbang du bya ste bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:65b-0: me long la @65b gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du dngos po ma lus pa rnams cig car yongs su shes pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65b-1: rkang med dang rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang /
T02TD1803E:65b-2: rkang mngas kyi sems can rnams kyang sems tsam mo zhes rnam pa gcig tu rtogs pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te de ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1803E:65b-3: phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams so sor rnam par phye ste rnam par brtags na thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no zhes shes nas chos thams cad kyi cha shas ni 'di dag go zhes padma'i 'dab ma ltar so sor rtog cing rtog pa med pas gnas pa de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te de ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65b-4: bdag dang gzhan gyi bya ba lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rdzogs par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes te de ni don yod par grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1803E:65b-5: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgrib pa dag cing las dang nyon mongs pa las grol te /
T02TD1803E:65b-6: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags rnam par sbyangs pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te de ni mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:65b-8: phung po khams dang de bzhin skye mched rnams //
T02TD1803E:65b-9: lnga po dbye ba lnga ru byas pa la //
T02TD1803E:65b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas so sor byin brlabs na //
T02TD1803E:65b-11: 'khor ba'i las rnams dag ni las 'byung //
T02TD1803E:65b-12: de bzhin dbang po phyi rol yul bcas lnga //
T02TD1803E:65b-13: re re zhing yang bder gshegs lnga rnams kyis //
T02TD1803E:65b-14: de la rang rang rtag tu byin rlob cing //
T02TD1803E:65b-15: ye shes lnga dang gsum du 'ang yang dag gnas //
T02TD1803E:65b-17: rigs ni rnam pa brgyar bshad pa //
T02TD1803E:65b-18: zhes bya ba'i mdo'i don bshad zin to //
T02TD1803E:65b-19: rdo rje slob mas gsol ba /
T02TD1803E:65b-20: rigs brgya'i rin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab yongs su bsags pa las grub pa'i lus yin par som nyi ma mchis na /
T02TD1803E:65b-21: yang ji ltar na de ni mdor bsdus na rnam pa lngar 'gyur ba lags //
T02TD1803E:65b-22: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:65b-23: khams bzhi po dag las lus kyi phung po mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:66a-0: khams rnams tshogs pa'i phyir 'byung ba las gyur pa 'byung @66a * //
T02TD1803E:66a-2: de bas na gang gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa 'byung ba las gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs can te /
T02TD1803E:66a-3: de ni sa'i khams sdud par byed pas nye bar 'gro'o //
T02TD1803E:66a-4: de bzhin du rin po che'i rigs can rnams ni chu'i khams so //
T02TD1803E:66a-5: padma'i rigs can rnams ni me'i khams so //
T02TD1803E:66a-6: las kyi rigs can rnams ni rlung gi khams so //
T02TD1803E:66a-7: rdo rje'i rigs can rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams su bsdus par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:66a-8: tshul 'dis na rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dbye bas phung po lnga rnams brgyar gyur pa yang gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba chen po lnga'i de kho na nyid du 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:66a-10: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02TD1803E:66a-11: dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes //
T02TD1803E:66a-13: bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya //
T02TD1803E:66a-15: don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:66a-16: 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid lnga //
T02TD1803E:66a-17: mi yi lus ni brtag bya ste //
T02TD1803E:66a-18: dngos de nges par bsgom pa yis //
T02TD1803E:66a-19: rang sems mthu yis sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:66a-21: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1803E:66a-22: 'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid //
T02TD1803E:66a-23: gar mkhan dag dang ri mo bzang ltar snang //
T02TD1803E:66a-24: gang du bde chen zhes bya gcig bu nyid //
T02TD1803E:66a-25: gcig pu nyams ni du mar gar mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:66a-27: mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i mdo'i don bshad zin to ;
T02TD1803E:66a-28: / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:66a-29: rnam pa lnga las ji ltar rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ba lags /
T02TD1803E:66a-30: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:66a-31: rin chen 'byung ldan ni sku rdo rje dang lhan cig gnyis su med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:66a-32: don yod grub pa ni gsung rdo rje dang lhan cig gnyis su med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:66a-33: mi bskyod pa ni drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig gnyis su med par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:66a-34: de ltar rigs brgya nas brtsams te /
T02TD1803E:66a-35: rigs lnga'i bar gyi bdag nyid can gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsdus par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:66b-0: ji @66b skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:66b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi zad pa'i rdo rje gsum gyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1803E:66b-2: lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na //
T02TD1803E:66b-3: ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med //
T02TD1803E:66b-4: sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la //
T02TD1803E:66b-5: byang chub med cing bsgom pa'ang med //
T02TD1803E:66b-6: lus dang ngag sems mtshan nyid du //
T02TD1803E:66b-7: mdor na rnam par dpyad nas su //
T02TD1803E:66b-8: sngags kyis brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1803E:66b-9: sbyor ba'i cho ga bsgom par bya //
T02TD1803E:66b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyong ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las kyang don 'di gsal bar bstan te /
T02TD1803E:66b-12: gzugs brnyan lugs ma sogs pa las //
T02TD1803E:66b-14: byang chub sems la rab brtson na //
T02TD1803E:66b-16: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD1803E:66b-17: dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no //
T02TD1803E:66b-18: da bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas //
T02TD1803E:66b-19: bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1803E:66b-21: lus dang ngag sems sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1803E:66b-22: gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1803E:66b-23: zhes bya ba'i mdo'i don bshad zin to //
T02TD1803E:66b-24: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:66b-25: rtogs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis yang dag par bsdus pa la ni som nyi ma mchis na rigs gsum po de yang ji ltar na rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi sku rdo rjer 'gyur ba lags /
T02TD1803E:66b-26: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:66b-27: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:66b-28: sems can chen po 'dus pa'i don la zhugs pa rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir lus rnam par dben pa'i mthar thug pa 'dri bar byed par byed pa legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:66b-29: de bas na ngas lus dang ngag dang yid dang phan tshun gcig la gcig rgyur gyur pa bstan nas sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhag par bya yis nyon cig / don la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni //
T02TD1803E:66b-30: dag kyang yid kyis bskul bya zhing //
T02TD1803E:66b-31: yid ni dga' bar byed pa yin //
T02TD1803E:67a-0: @67a * // dngos grub rab mchog bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1803E:67a-1: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:67a-3: de la sku rdo rjer gyur nas rkan dang mchu sbyar ba dang /
T02TD1803E:67a-4: lce'i tshogs rnam par gyur pa las gsung rdo rje la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:67a-5: thugs rdo rje ni de la skul bar byed pa yin te de ltar gsum tshogs pa las yid dga' zhing tshim par byed pa'i dngos grub rdzogs par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1803E:67a-6: de ltar lus dang ngag dang yid la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid brtags nas da ni rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:67a-7: gsang ba 'dus pa las khyed kyi sems lus lta bu dang /
T02TD1803E:67a-9: sems tshig tu brjod pa lta bu skyed cig ces gsungs pas bdag ni rang bzhin gyi bdag po'i zhes bdag nyid brtan pa bskyed la rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por lhag par mos par byas pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor ces bya bar bshad do //
T02TD1803E:67a-10: lus rnam par dben pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1803E:67a-12: // / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:67a-13: lus rnam par dben pa la bslab pa la ni som nyi ma ma mchis na /
T02TD1803E:67a-14: bcom ldan 'das ngag rnam par dben pa la ji ltar bslab bar bgyi /
T02TD1803E:67a-15: ji ltar rab tu bsgrub par bgyi /
T02TD1803E:67a-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:67a-17: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:67a-18: sems can chen po legs so legs so phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa ni lus rnam par dben pa ste /
T02TD1803E:67a-19: de la lha rnam par dgod pa ni thams cad kyi thun mong ste /
T02TD1803E:67a-20: rags pa'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:67a-21: ngag rnam par dben pa de yang rnal 'byor ba'i ye shes te /
T02TD1803E:67a-22: shin tu phra ba theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa rdo rje'i theg pa rnams las kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa la spyod pa rnams kyi yul ma yin te shin tu phra ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:67b-0: de bas na ngas khyod la bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rgya cher so sor rtogs par bya yis shin tu 'bad de nyon cig / de la rigs ni rnam pa @67b brgyar gsungs te zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i mdo ni lus dang ngag dang sems rnam par dben pa'i yang thun mong yin no //
T02TD1803E:67b-1: de la ngag rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1803E:67b-2: de yang rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi rim pa dang bral bas ni de shes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:67b-3: rlung gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni srog dang rtsol ba'o //
T02TD1803E:67b-4: de bas na rlung gi de kho na nyid bstan pa'i tshig dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
T02TD1803E:67b-5: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
T02TD1803E:67b-6: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam //
T02TD1803E:67b-7: sna yi rtse mor nan tan du //
T02TD1803E:67b-8: de nyid sbyor bas rtag tu bsgom //
T02TD1803E:67b-10: rdo rje'i tshig nges pa dang drang ba'i don gyi dbye bas lha'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis la yang sbyar te /
T02TD1803E:67b-11: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom par byed pas ni sna'i rtse mor yungs kar gyi 'bru tshod tsam gyi rang gi lha'i mtshan ma rang sems brtan par bya ba'i phyir bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan pa 'di ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:67b-12: 'di nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phra mo'i rnal 'byor bshad pa ni a'a li k'a li rnams kyi bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gi tshul gyi yi ge gsum bskyed la yi ge gsum yang 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang bar nges par sbyar la dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim gyis srog dang rtsol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD1803E:67b-13: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
T02TD1803E:67b-14: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02TD1803E:67b-15: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1803E:67b-16: gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni //
T02TD1803E:67b-17: sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag / rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
T02TD1803E:67b-18: srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad //
T02TD1803E:67b-20: mdor bstan pa 'di'i bshad pa gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud dgongs pa lung ston pa las bshad de /
T02TD1803E:67b-21: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02TD1803E:67b-22: rdo rje snying po'i don gsungs pa ;
T02TD1803E:67b-23: /'gro ba'i bla ma gcig bu la //
T02TD1803E:67b-24: phyag 'tshal nas ni slar gsol pa //
T02TD1803E:67b-25: 'jig rten pa yi lung nyid kyis //
T02TD1803E:67b-26: byang chub sems ni rab gsungs na //
T02TD1803E:67b-28: ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs //
T02TD1803E:67b-29: lta ba thams cad rab spang phyir //
T02TD1803E:68a-2: ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid //
T02TD1803E:68a-3: lta ba de ni rab bstan 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:68a-4: dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams //
T02TD1803E:68a-5: gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas //
T02TD1803E:68a-6: gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes //
T02TD1803E:68a-7: de ni ji bzhin sgrar 'dzin to //
T02TD1803E:68a-8: de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs bas //
T02TD1803E:68a-9: lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa //
T02TD1803E:68a-10: khyed gsang dgongs pa ma rtogs pa //
T02TD1803E:68a-11: 'dri bar byed pa legs so legs //
T02TD1803E:68a-12: byang chub sems ni rlung 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1803E:68a-13: nam mkha' la ni rnam gnas pa //
T02TD1803E:68a-14: sems can kun gyi srog gyur yin //
T02TD1803E:68a-15: lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can //
T02TD1803E:68a-16: rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa //
T02TD1803E:68a-17: ngo bo nyid rnams gsum du 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:68a-18: rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems //
T02TD1803E:68a-19: dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin //
T02TD1803E:68a-20: 'di ltar mi mngon phra ba las //
T02TD1803E:68a-21: rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin //
T02TD1803E:68a-22: 'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa //
T02TD1803E:68a-23: 'dir ni de la brten pa yin //
T02TD1803E:68a-24: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02TD1803E:68a-25: dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams //
T02TD1803E:68a-26: de nyid gsum gnas la brten nas //
T02TD1803E:68a-27: de kun byang chub sems kyis byed //
T02TD1803E:68a-28: ji srid 'jig rten brtag pa dang //
T02TD1803E:68a-29: de bzhin brtag pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02TD1803E:68a-30: rnam rtog byang chub sems zhes pa'i //
T02TD1803E:68a-31: rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin //
T02TD1803E:68a-32: bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi //
T02TD1803E:68a-33: sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin //
T02TD1803E:68a-34: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di //
T02TD1803E:68a-35: phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam //
T02TD1803E:68a-36: shes rab thabs gcig sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1803E:68a-38: klog dang bsam gtan rnams spang par //
T02TD1803E:68a-39: bdag po rang nyid zlos pa ste ;
T02TD1803E:68a-40: / nyin dang mtshan mo dbye ba yis //
T02TD1803E:68a-41: nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yin /
T02TD1803E:68a-42: dngos po med pas 'gro khyab pa'i //
T02TD1803E:68a-43: byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu //
T02TD1803E:68a-44: dge dang mi dge'i 'bras spangs na //
T02TD1803E:68a-47: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:68a-48: rlung lnga'i bdag nyid bcu ming can //
T02TD1803E:68a-50: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzhag ste /
T02TD1803E:68a-51: re re'i ming gi dbye ba gzhan bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:68a-52: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:68a-53: bshad ma thag pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud nyid las bstan pa de dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs @68b kun dang //
T02TD1803E:68b-1: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD1803E:68b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag po de //
T02TD1803E:68b-3: mnyes bya'i phyir ni zhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:68b-4: srog dang thur sel gyen rgyu dang //
T02TD1803E:68b-5: khyab dang mnyam gnas zhes bshad dang //
T02TD1803E:68b-6: klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang //
T02TD1803E:68b-7: lha sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgyal //
T02TD1803E:68b-8: de dag bdag gzugs bud med du //
T02TD1803E:68b-9: slar yang sprul par mdzad pa yin //
T02TD1803E:68b-10: rlung bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i mchog gi tshul las ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pas gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:68b-14: ko ta bashtsa sha / ko t'i ra ga:/
T02TD1803E:68b-20: ming bcu po de dag ni rdo rje'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang sgra ji bzhin pa'i don gyis rlung bcur gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:68b-21: srog dang thur du sel ba dang /
T02TD1803E:68b-22: me dang mnyam du gnas pa dang /
T02TD1803E:68b-27: yang dag par rgyu ba dang /
T02TD1803E:68b-29: nges par rgyu ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-30: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:68b-31: srog ces bya ba la sogs pa rlung bcu po lus 'di la gang zhig rab tu gnas nas ci zhig bgyid pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:68b-32: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:68b-33: rlung lnga ni lus kyi cha la gnas nas lus kyi bya ba rnams byed do //
T02TD1803E:68b-34: rlung lnga ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mched la gnas nas dbang po rnams kyi bya ba rnams byed do //
T02TD1803E:68b-35: de la srog ces bya ba'i rlung snying gar gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-36: thur du sel ba mdoms na gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD1803E:68b-37: gyen du rgyu ba lkog mar gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-38: me dang mnyam du gnas pa lte bar gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-39: khyab byed tshigs thams cad la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:68b-40: rgyu ba'i rlung ni gzugs so //
T02TD1803E:68b-41: rnam par rgyu ba ni sgra'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-42: yang dag par rgyu ba ni dri'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-43: rab tu rgyu ba ni ro'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-44: nges par rgyu ba ni reg bya'o //
T02TD1803E:68b-45: yang rlung bcu po 'di dag ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-1: kyang rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-2: yang de rnams lha mo bzhi'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-3: yang de rnams 'byung ba rnam pa lngar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-4: yang de rnams me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnam pa lngar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-5: yang de rnams dkar po la sogs pa 'od zer rnam pa lnga'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-6: yang de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-7: yang de rnams yi ge gsum gyi gzhir gyur nas 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i rim gyis rdo rje bzlas pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-8: yang rlung de rnams yi ge aa'i gzhir gyur nas tshig ma lus par smra bar byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:69a-9: yang de rnams mi shigs pa thob na dngos po med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:69a-10: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:69a-11: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rlung bcu po 'di dag gcig dang du ma'i ngo bos rang gi lus la nyin dang mtshan du spro ba dang sdud par bgyid /
T02TD1803E:69a-12: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:69a-13: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:69a-14: sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:69a-15: dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud bla ma las ji ltar rlung gi de kho na nyid dgongs par bshad kyis gsal bar ma gsungs la /
T02TD1803E:69a-16: de bshad pa'i rgyud las sgra ji bzhin par gsungs pas de la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:69a-17: sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas pa //
T02TD1803E:69a-18: sna rtse'i bu ga las byung zhing //
T02TD1803E:69a-19: rlung lnga steng du yang dag rgyu //
T02TD1803E:69a-20: lus la rtag tu spyod par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:69a-21: kun rdzob snar ni spyod pa yi //
T02TD1803E:69a-22: sgo de las ni rnam par 'byung //
T02TD1803E:69a-23: g-yon dang g-yas dang gnyis ka dang //
T02TD1803E:69a-24: dal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1803E:69a-25: g-yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams //
T02TD1803E:69a-26: me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te //
T02TD1803E:69a-27: kha dog dmar ba'i mchog 'di ni //
T02TD1803E:69a-29: g-yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams //
T02TD1803E:69a-30: rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba dag / ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste //
T02TD1803E:69a-31: las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1803E:69a-32: gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams //
T02TD1803E:69a-33: gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste //
T02TD1803E:69a-34: dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02TD1803E:69b-0: rin chen @69b mgon po rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1803E:69b-1: dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams //
T02TD1803E:69b-2: dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ste //
T02TD1803E:69b-3: skad cig chu yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1803E:69b-4: rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1803E:69b-5: khams kun yang dag 'byung ba ni //
T02TD1803E:69b-6: rten dang brten par bzung ba ni //
T02TD1803E:69b-7: rnam snang mdzad chen sku yin no //
T02TD1803E:69b-10: mnyam par gzhag pas rtag tu zlos //
T02TD1803E:69b-11: sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyis ni //
T02TD1803E:69b-12: nyin dang mtshan du rtag par zlos //
T02TD1803E:69b-13: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen po las gsungs so //
T02TD1803E:69b-15: padma dang rdo rje'i sna dag las 'od zer rnams byung nas steng du song ste /
T02TD1803E:69b-16: kun rdzob kyi sna'i sgo las g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dang gnyis ka dang dal gyis rgyu ba'i rim gyis 'byung ngo //
T02TD1803E:69b-17: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:69b-18: sna g-yon ba nas nges par 'byung ba'i rlung ni de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par grub pa'i rlung gi ngo bo ste /
T02TD1803E:69b-19: rlung gi dkyil 'khor mdog ljang ser 'od zer nag po'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1803E:69b-20: sna g-yas nas rgyu ba'i rlung ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa ste me'i rang bzhin me'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dmar po'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1803E:69b-21: sna gnyi ga las byung ba'i rlung ni rin chen 'byung ldan te dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor 'od zer ser po'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1803E:69b-22: dal zhing rgyu ba bul ba'i rlung ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid do /
T02TD1803E:69b-23: gsal ba'i rang bzhin chu'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dkar po'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1803E:69b-24: khyab byed kyis ni khams kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi char la khyab pa'i rlung ste mi 'byung zhing khyab pa'i 'od zer can ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1803E:69b-25: de lta mod kyi 'od zer re re 'byung ba na yang 'od zer lnga lnga nges par 'byung ste /
T02TD1803E:69b-26: khams kyi dkyil 'khor gcig gis kyang khams bzhi char la khyab pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:69b-27: dkyil 'khor re re la yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyi bdag po 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rtag tu rang nyid zlos pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:69b-28: 'di rlung gi de kho na nyid mdor bsdus nas bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:69b-29: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:69b-30: bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis rlung gi de kho na nyid lung dang rtogs pa dag gis legs par bslabs te /
T02TD1803E:70a-0: @70a * // da ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rang gi mtshan nyid shes par 'tshal na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzhag ste /
T02TD1803E:70a-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:70a-3: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:70a-4: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba gang de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rgyud bla ma las sngags tsam gsungs kyi sngags btub ni ma bstan to //
T02TD1803E:70a-5: bshad pa'i rgyud las ni sngags btu ba dang /
T02TD1803E:70a-8: sngags kyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa kho nar gsungs so //
T02TD1803E:70a-9: de nas bshad pa'i rgyud ma rtogs na phyi rol gyi sngags la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyis shes par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:70a-10: de bas na 'bad pas nyon cig / bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas sngags kyi de kho na nyid 'ba' zhig khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:70a-11: de la sprul la sogs pa'i sngags rnams ni a'a li k'a li las yang dag par byung ba rnams so //
T02TD1803E:70a-12: de rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni mi shigs pa las byung ba'i yi ge gsum ste /
T02TD1803E:70a-13: gang gi phyir sngags thams cad ni bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gi ngo bo nyid kyi man ngag ji ltar thos pas yi ge gsum la rab tu 'jug go //
T02TD1803E:70a-14: de bas na yi ge gsum ni sngags thams cad kyi bdag po'o /
T02TD1803E:70a-15: 'de ni yang re re zhing mi shigs pa dang lhan cig yi ge gsum gsum las 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD1803E:70a-16: da ni yi ge gsum gyi bya ba bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:70a-17: de la dang por gsum yang dag par sbyor ba las lha'i sku 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:70a-18: de nyid 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i rim gyis lus nyin mtshan du 'dzin par byed do //
T02TD1803E:70a-19: de nyid a'a li k'a li rnams dang lhan cig dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus su kha thur du bltas par gyur bas gsang ba'i sna'i bu gnas sa bon gyi gzugs kyis byung nas sems can gyi khams rnams skyed par byed do //
T02TD1803E:70a-20: de nyid srog dang rtsol ba dang lhan cig yang steng du song nas dbang po'i sgo rnams sad par byed cing kun rdzob kyi sna'i sgo nas g-yon dang g-yas la sogs pa'i rim pas byung nas lhun gyis grub pas rdo rje bzlas pa bya ste /
T02TD1803E:70b-0: sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnam @70b bar sbyong bar byed do //
T02TD1803E:70b-1: de nyid nyid mo dang mtshan mo'i rim gyis bzlas pa'i grangs nye bar bzung nas chu la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du byung ste /
T02TD1803E:70b-2: dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog la gnas nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de //
T02TD1803E:70b-3: de nyid yi ge'i gzugs su yongs su brtags la lce rtse shin tu mi bskyod cing //
T02TD1803E:70b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag gi bzlas brjod kyi mtshan nyid kyis bzlas brjod byas nas phyi'i kha dog la sogs pa'i bya ba la brten te zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed do //
T02TD1803E:70b-5: yi ge gsum po de nyid ni sbyang bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1803E:70b-7: 'bar bar bya ba pa'i rim gyis kha zas rnam par sbyangs te skyon med par byed do //
T02TD1803E:70b-8: de ltar lus la gnas pa'i skabs su thams cad bya ste /
T02TD1803E:70b-9: mthar mi shigs par zhugs nas yang tha mal ba'i lus la brten te /
T02TD1803E:70b-10: de bzhin du thams cad byed do //
T02TD1803E:70b-11: da ni yi ge gsum bskyed pa dgongs pa lung ston pa zhes bya pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1803E:70b-12: dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na //
T02TD1803E:70b-13: gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa //
T02TD1803E:70b-14: de ni bcing med ces bya ste //
T02TD1803E:70b-15: de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas //
T02TD1803E:70b-16: dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste //
T02TD1803E:70b-17: grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa //
T02TD1803E:70b-18: aas bcings phan tshun sbyor ba la //
T02TD1803E:70b-19: gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla //
T02TD1803E:70b-20: gang zhig shes nas rnam grol ba'i //
T02TD1803E:70b-23: dngos med pas ni dngos spangs pa //
T02TD1803E:70b-24: 'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD1803E:70b-25: cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas //
T02TD1803E:70b-26: lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1803E:70b-27: bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar //
T02TD1803E:70b-28: yi ge a'am bcas ring por bcas //
T02TD1803E:70b-29: yon tan sbyor sogs phyis dang ldan //
T02TD1803E:70b-30: thung du ma lus ngag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:70b-31: gcig min du ma ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:70b-32: ya yi don gyis gang ci 'ang rung //
T02TD1803E:70b-33: bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pas //
T02TD1803E:70b-34: ral sogs pa gsum nyid kyis //
T02TD1803E:70b-35: 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug / yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang //
T02TD1803E:70b-36: gang yang mngon par phyogs pa rnams //
T02TD1803E:70b-37: bud med skyed pa ma ning ste //
T02TD1803E:70b-38: khams la sogs par rab tu brtag /'og nas steng du bcas par ni //
T02TD1803E:70b-39: shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar //
T02TD1803E:71a-0: drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang @71a * //
T02TD1803E:71a-1: gcig / dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung //
T02TD1803E:71a-2: de ni yang sogs don sbyar nas //
T02TD1803E:71a-4: mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin //
T02TD1803E:71a-5: 'gro ba rnams ni rgyu mthar bya //
T02TD1803E:71a-6: brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag / dngos med ngo bo las byung ba //
T02TD1803E:71a-7: de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1803E:71a-8: lha ru nye bar dmigs pa gang //
T02TD1803E:71a-9: brda yis de nyid gsum gnas pa //
T02TD1803E:71a-10: rang bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1803E:71a-11: ming med brjod du med pa ste //
T02TD1803E:71a-12: byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no //
T02TD1803E:71a-13: gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa //
T02TD1803E:71a-15: 'gag med rab tu zhi ba nyid //
T02TD1803E:71a-16: rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1803E:71a-17: dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i //
T02TD1803E:71a-18: rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan //
T02TD1803E:71a-19: 'di nyid kho na don dam ste //
T02TD1803E:71a-20: so so rang rig mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1803E:71a-21: bya ba thams cad nyid du yang //
T02TD1803E:71a-22: rnal 'byor rig pa nyal sogs la //
T02TD1803E:71a-23: ming med brjod du med pa dang //
T02TD1803E:71a-24: dus gsum bzlas pa rtag tu bzla //
T02TD1803E:71a-25: gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa //
T02TD1803E:71a-26: brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga //
T02TD1803E:71a-27: bzhi po legs par bsdus pa yis //
T02TD1803E:71a-28: sbyor bzhi bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu //
T02TD1803E:71a-29: dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa //
T02TD1803E:71a-30: nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim gyis ni //
T02TD1803E:71a-31: de ni so sor 'byung ba las //
T02TD1803E:71a-32: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
T02TD1803E:71a-33: de 'dir gsang ba dgongs pa yis //
T02TD1803E:71a-34: phra mo rnal 'byor bstan pa yin //
T02TD1803E:71a-35: klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi //
T02TD1803E:71a-36: 'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad //
T02TD1803E:71a-38: de ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid yin par bshad do //
T02TD1803E:71a-39: rdo rje slob mas gsol ba /
T02TD1803E:71a-40: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi ngag gi yi ge la 'jug par bya ba la ni som nyi ma mchis na /
T02TD1803E:71a-42: thung du ma lus tshig tu 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:71a-44: bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar na thung du zhes bya ba yi ge aa tshig ma lus pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:71a-45: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:71a-46: sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:71b-0: 'di na gsung rab 'chad pa dag ni by'a ka ra na'i tshig sngon du byas nas sgra'i don 'ba' zhig gi rjes su 'brang gi / yang yi ges brjod pa gang du gang gi phyir ji @71b ltar rab tu 'jug par shes pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:71b-1: yi ge'i don de kho na nyid ji lta ba nyid mi shes te /
T02TD1803E:71b-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:71b-3: bstan pa'i rim gyis de khong du chud par bya yis nyon cig / de la sgra ni a'a li k'a li rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1803E:71b-4: a'a li ni aa la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug go //
T02TD1803E:71b-5: k'a li zhes bya ba ni yi ge ka la sogs pa yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum ste /
T02TD1803E:71b-6: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang ldan pa'i yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu po ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad de dbyangs kyi yi ge dang /
T02TD1803E:71b-9: tsheg drag dang bcas pa dang skad kyi byings dang /
T02TD1803E:71b-12: tshig rnam par sbyar ba dang /
T02TD1803E:71b-15: bya ba dang de la phan pa'i rkyen la sogs pa nas bshad pa'i mthar thug pa ni by'a ka ra na zhes pa'i ming gi brdas yongs su bshad pas shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:71b-16: de bas na de'i tshig dang ngag dang sdeb sbyor dang /
T02TD1803E:71b-19: rkyang pa dang rgyun chags la sogs pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdo sde dang /
T02TD1803E:71b-24: gar gyi bstan bcos la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnams yang dag par 'byung ste /
T02TD1803E:71b-25: bstan bcos la brten nas dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:71b-26: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lang kar gshegs ba'i mdo las kyang blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
T02TD1803E:71b-27: skyes bu la la zhig mar me thogs nas phyogs 'di na nga'i nor 'di lta bu 'di yod do zhes nor lta ba de bzhin du blo gros chen po tshig tu rnam par rtog pa'i sgra'i mar mes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshig gi rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba so so rang gis rig pa'i don gyi yul la rjes su 'jug go zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1803E:71b-28: 'on kyang tshig de rnams kyi tshig dang ngag la sogs par gtogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyi bye brag rnam par shes par 'gyur ba ni aa zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:72a-0: gang gi phyir aa dang yang dag par ldan par ma @72a * //
T02TD1803E:72a-1: gyur pa'i ka la sogs ba'i yi ge ni yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD1803E:72a-2: mtha' can yin pa'i phyir tshig tu mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:72a-3: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las /
T02TD1803E:72a-4: aa ni yig 'bru rnams kyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
T02TD1803E:72a-5: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02TD1803E:72a-6: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02TD1803E:72a-7: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD1803E:72a-8: ces gsungs te de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan ma lus pa'i sgo'i sa bon gyi tshig aa ni skye ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:72a-9: lhan cig skyes pa'i yi ge yin par yang gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:72a-10: rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:72a-11: aa ni gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1803E:72a-12: snying gi dbus na mi shigs pa //
T02TD1803E:72a-13: 'bar zhing mar me dag dang mtshungs //
T02TD1803E:72a-14: mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba ste //
T02TD1803E:72a-15: aa ni gtso bo dam pa'o //
T02TD1803E:72a-17: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad aa'i rigs su gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:72a-19: aa las nges par 'byung ba ste /
T02TD1803E:72a-20: brjod bzhin pa na 'gag pa'i ngo bo nyid ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid shes na sgra dang sgra ma yin pa la ltos pa med par sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbye bas gdul bya'i skye bo rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:72a-21: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:72a-22: blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don la rton par bya'i yi ge la rton par mi bya'o //
T02TD1803E:72a-23: blo gros chen po yi ge'i phyir 'brang ba'i rigs kyi bu pho'am /
T02TD1803E:72a-24: rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag kyang don dam pa las nyams par byed cing gzhan yang khong du chud par mi byed do //
T02TD1803E:72a-25: 'di lta ste blo gros chen po la las gcig gis gcig la sor mo'i rtse mos ci zhig bstan na sor mo'i rtse mo nyid la lta zhing 'brang ba de bzhin du blo gros chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sde rnams kyis byis pa'i rang bzhin can lta bu sgra ji bzhin gyi sor mo'i rtse mo la mngon par chags shing zhen to //
T02TD1803E:72b-0: mngon par zhen cing dus byed de sgra ji bzhin pa'i @72b sor mo'i rtse mo lta bu'i don spangs nas don dam pa la tshol bar mi byed do //
T02TD1803E:72b-1: de bas na don 'dod pas de bsten par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:72b-2: de'i phyir na gang sgra ji bzhin pa'i phyin ci log la mngon par zhen pa de ni spang bar bya'o //
T02TD1803E:72b-3: don btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig la 'jug pa yang rnam ba bzhir bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di nyid las gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:72b-4: blo gros chen po tshig gi rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi yod de /
T02TD1803E:72b-5: 'di ltar mtshan nyid kyi tshig dang /
T02TD1803E:72b-7: gnas ngan len la mngon par zhen pa'i tshig dang /
T02TD1803E:72b-8: thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rnam par rtog pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1803E:72b-9: blo gros chen po de la mtshan nyid kyi tshig ni rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs la mtshan mar mngon par zhen pa las byung ngo //
T02TD1803E:72b-10: blo gros chen po rmi lam gyi tshig ni sngon myong ba'i yul rjes su dran nas rtog pa'i yul med bzhin du 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1803E:72b-11: yang blo gros chen po gnas ngan len gyi rnam par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa'i tshig ni sngon sgras byas pa'i las rjes su dran pa las 'byung ngo //
T02TD1803E:72b-12: blo gros chen po thog ma med pa'i dus nas rnam par rtog pa'i tshig ni thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa la mngon par zhen pa'i gnas ngan len gyi rang gi sa bon las 'byung ste /
T02TD1803E:72b-13: 'di ni blo gros chen po tshig gi rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi'o zhes gang brjod pa de'i phyir bshad pa'o //
T02TD1803E:72b-14: rigs pa 'dis na sgra rnams ni yi ge aa las byung bas na mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1803E:72b-16: mi 'gyur ba ni mi 'jig pa ste /
T02TD1803E:72b-17: mi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgra'i sgo nas rab tu bstan pa de yang ma bcos pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1803E:72b-18: ji skad du tshul gcig bar bstan pa'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:72b-19: chos 'di sgra skad dag gis lung bstan te //
T02TD1803E:72b-20: chos dang sgra dag 'dir ni snang mi 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:72b-21: chos nyid tshul gcig dngos la'ang 'jug byed pa //
T02TD1803E:72b-22: bzod mchog bla na med la reg par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:72b-24: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:72b-25: gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma byas byed du ma bcug / rjes su yi rang ba ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:73a-2: 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste /
T02TD1803E:73a-3: chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni ye nas gnas pa ste /
T02TD1803E:73a-4: de yang 'di ltar gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do //
T02TD1803E:73a-5: de la gsang ba'i bdag po 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod de /
T02TD1803E:73a-6: des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad myos pas brgyal bar byed cing /
T02TD1803E:73a-7: me tog mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs nyams dga' ba sna tshogs kyang ston la /
T02TD1803E:73a-9: nye bar spyad pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyang mngon par sprul nas //
T02TD1803E:73a-10: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang sbyin la /
T02TD1803E:73a-11: bdag nyid kyang yongs su spyod do //
T02TD1803E:73a-12: 'di lta ste lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la yid mgyogs zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags yod de /
T02TD1803E:73a-13: des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi dgos pa byed cing nye bar spyod pa dang /
T02TD1803E:73a-14: yongs su spyad pa thams cad kyang mngon par sprul nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la yang sbyin la /
T02TD1803E:73a-15: bdag nyid kyang kun du spyod do //
T02TD1803E:73a-16: 'di lta ste dper na mig 'phrul mkhan gyis gsang sngags kyis kun dga'i ra ba dang /
T02TD1803E:73a-18: mi la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs ston to //
T02TD1803E:73a-19: 'di lta ste dper na lha ma yin rnams ni gsang sngags kyis sgyu ma rnams ston to //
T02TD1803E:73a-20: 'di lta ste dper na gsang sngags dag gis ni dug dang rims la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:73a-21: 'di lta ste ma mo zhes bya ba'i lha mo rnams ni gsang sngags kyis nad 'go ba gtong ngo //
T02TD1803E:73a-22: 'di lta ste dper na gsang sngags kyis me'i tsha ba med par byas nas grang par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:73a-23: rigs kyi bu dag dpe'i tshig 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi mthu la mngon par dad par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:73a-24: gsang sngags kyi mthu de yang gsang sngags rnams las byung ba ma yin /
T02TD1803E:73a-25: rdzas las 'jug pa yang ma yin /
T02TD1803E:73a-26: sbyor ba po las dmigs pa yang ma yin mod kyi /
T02TD1803E:73a-27: rigs kyi bu dag 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos nyid 'byung ba las 'da' bar mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:73a-28: dus gsum las 'das pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1803E:73b-0: rten cing 'brel @73b par 'byung ba zab mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:73b-1: rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa khong du chud pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1803E:73b-2: de ltar phyi dang nang gi sngags dang /
T02TD1803E:73b-3: nor bu dang sman rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu rtogs pa dag bstan nas /
T02TD1803E:73b-4: da ni rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi khams rnams kyi ngag rnams par dag pa ji lta ba nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa /
T02TD1803E:73b-5: mi'am ci'i rgyal pos zhus pa'i mdo las gsungs pa ;
T02TD1803E:73b-6: mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad gang las byung smras pa /
T02TD1803E:73b-7: rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad ni nam mkha' las byung ngo //
T02TD1803E:73b-9: mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad khong pa'i nang nas mi 'byung ngam /
T02TD1803E:73b-11: rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems /
T02TD1803E:73b-12: sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad lus kyi nang khong nas 'byung ngam /
T02TD1803E:73b-15: mi'am ci'i bdag po lus las kyang ma yin /
T02TD1803E:73b-16: sems las kyang ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:73b-18: lus ni bems po g-yo ba med pa byed pa med pa /
T02TD1803E:73b-26: rnam par rig pa med pa ste sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T02TD1803E:73b-28: rigs kyi bu lus dang sems ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur /
