T02TD1803E:73b-30: mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can rnams kyi sgra ni nam mkha' las 'byung bar rtogs so //
T02TD1803E:73b-32: gal te nam mkha' med na sgra gang las 'byung /
T02TD1803E:73b-34: mi'am ci'i bdag po nam mkha' ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:73b-36: rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis sgra'i tha snyad gang ji snyed 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' las 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:73b-37: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid ni sgra ste /
T02TD1803E:73b-38: rnam par rig ma thag tu 'gag go //
T02TD1803E:73b-39: 'gags nas nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du yang dag par gnas so //
T02TD1803E:74a-0: de'i phyir chos thams cad ni nam @74a * //
T02TD1803E:74a-1: mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya ste /
T02TD1803E:74a-2: rnam par rig pa med pa de rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin mod kyi sgra dang sgra'i brdas brjod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-3: brjod pa de yang tha snyad do //
T02TD1803E:74a-4: gang sgras brjod pa 'di 'dra bar rab tu shes pa de ni chos gang la yang mngon par mi chags so //
T02TD1803E:74a-5: gang mngon par mi chags pa de rnam par mi 'phro /
T02TD1803E:74a-6: gang rnam par mi 'phro ba de mi 'khor ro //
T02TD1803E:74a-7: gang mi 'khor ba de ni mi phyed pa'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-8: gang mi phyed pa de ni mi skye ba'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-9: gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'jig par 'dod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-10: gang mi 'jig pa de dang ba'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-11: gang dang ba de dag pa'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-12: gang dag pa de dri ma med pa'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-13: gang dri ma med pa de 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-14: gang 'od gsal ba de sems kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1803E:74a-15: sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-16: gang 'jug pa de mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-17: gang mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa de skyon med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste /
T02TD1803E:74a-19: des na skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-20: gang bzod pa thob pa des thams cad bzod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-22: gang zag tu yang bzod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-24: gang zag las stong pa gzhan ma yin te /
T02TD1803E:74a-26: de mtshan mar yang bzod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-27: mtshan ma med par bzod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-29: mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-31: smon pa med par yang bzod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-33: smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni smon pa med pa'o //
T02TD1803E:74a-34: de sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang bzod /
T02TD1803E:74a-35: de sems can rnams 'chi 'pho dang skye bar yang bzod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-37: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba ni / mtshan ma med par bzod do //
T02TD1803E:74a-39: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1803E:74a-40: rigs kyi bu de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gal ba med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:74a-41: chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:74b-0: de ltar gsung gi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen pos rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i sems @74b can gyi khams rnams kyi nyes pa dang yon tan brjod pa'i tshig thos nas rjes su chags par mi bya /
T02TD1803E:74b-1: yang dag par dga' bar mi bya /
T02TD1803E:74b-3: kun du skrag par mi bya /
T02TD1803E:74b-5: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rgyun chags dang rkyang pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par thos nas zhen par mi bya /
T02TD1803E:74b-8: sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1803E:74b-9: sgra'i de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:74b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad rab tu 'jug pa bstan par bya ba'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:74b-12: lha'i bu sgra grag pa la 'jug pas zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gal te gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par mi bden zhing bsnyen bkur ma yin pa'i tshig smras par gyur cing /
T02TD1803E:74b-13: yongs su brjod par gyur kyang de de la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:74b-14: gal te gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bsnyen bkur byed /
T02TD1803E:74b-16: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang chos gos dang /
T02TD1803E:74b-20: yo byad rnams kyis mchod cing rjed kyang de la rjes su chags pa'i sems skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1803E:74b-21: de bzhin du gsung gi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i sngags pas brgyad pa'i dbang phyug ni rnyed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:74b-27: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyis 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:74b-28: yang dag par dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:74b-29: de bas na 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad zil gyis mnan nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin las 'das pa sems rnam par dben pa tshol bar 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya'o //
T02TD1803E:74b-30: ngag rnam par dben pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u gsum pa'o /
T02TD1803E:74b-32: // / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:74b-33: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi rim pas sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:74b-34: ngag rnam par dben pa la yang som nyi ma mchis te /
T02TD1803E:75a-0: da ni sems rnam par dben pa la slob par 'tshal na ji ltar @75a * //
T02TD1803E:75a-2: zab mo la lhag par mos pa rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:75a-3: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:75a-4: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:75a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi man ngag yang dag par 'gro ba las kha phyir bltas pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa /
T02TD1803E:75a-7: mchog tu gzung bar dka' ba /
T02TD1803E:75a-8: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul yongs su dris pa'i sems gang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid ni rtsa ba med pa /
T02TD1803E:75a-12: dbyibs dang kha dog med pa /
T02TD1803E:75a-14: rtog ge rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud thams cad las bstan pa'i tshig la gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:75a-15: de lta bas na rdo rje theg pa la gnas nas sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byas nas rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid btsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1803E:75a-16: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:75a-17: rigs kyi bu mnyam par gzhag pas rang gi sems so sor rtogs shig ces gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:75a-18: dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las kyang byang chub ni rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:75a-19: sde snod gsum gyi tshul las kyang //
T02TD1803E:75a-20: gcig pu 'gro zhing ring du rgyu //
T02TD1803E:75a-21: lus med dbang po'i phug na gnas //
T02TD1803E:75a-22: gdul bar dka' ba'i sems 'dul byed //
T02TD1803E:75a-23: de ni bram zer ngas bshad do //
T02TD1803E:75a-24: bdud kyi bcing ba las grol 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:75a-26: de bas na sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du byed par 'dod pas g-yeng ba dang sgrib pa thams cad spangs te /
T02TD1803E:75a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi man ngag yang dag par thob pa'i rdo rje slob dpon mnyes par byas la dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin snang ba rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:75a-28: ji skad du lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:75b-0: yang blo gros chen po gzhan @75b yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi sems kyi snang ba'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul yongs su shes par 'dod pas 'du ba dang /
T02TD1803E:75b-4: de la rnam par shes pa gsum ni dngos po thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:75b-12: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1803E:75b-20: ma ning la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:75b-24: mdor na khams gsum po'i dbang po'i spyod yul rnams ni rnam par shes pa gsum yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:75b-25: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:75b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:75b-27: bzang skyong 'khrul 'khor de ni las kyi dbang gis 'jug ste /
T02TD1803E:75b-28: las de yang gzugs can ma yin zhing rnam par shes pa las mngon par grub pa'o //
T02TD1803E:75b-29: de bzhin du lus kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di yang rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis 'byung ste /
T02TD1803E:75b-30: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus sna tshogs la 'jug pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:75b-31: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus skyed par byed pa'i phyir byed pa po yang yin no //
T02TD1803E:75b-32: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni chos kyi dbyings la brten pa'i phyir mi zad pa yang yin no //
T02TD1803E:75b-33: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni sngon gyi lus kyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i phyir blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yang yin no //
T02TD1803E:75b-34: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste /
T02TD1803E:75b-35: dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni dri nga ba dag dang mi gtsang ba dag dang /
T02TD1803E:75b-36: ro dag la yang 'bab pa ste /
T02TD1803E:75b-37: 'on kyang dri des gos par yang mi 'gyur la /
T02TD1803E:75b-38: nyi ma yang dri nga ba bor te yang mi 'gro'o //
T02TD1803E:75b-39: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang phyi sa dang /
T02TD1803E:75b-40: snyag snyig za ba'i khyi dang phag gi skye ba dag tu yang skye ba yongs su 'dzin te /
T02TD1803E:76a-0: 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod pa ngan pa @76a * //
T02TD1803E:76a-1: de dag gis gos pa med do //
T02TD1803E:76a-2: de nas sman chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas /
T02TD1803E:76a-3: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1803E:76a-4: rnam par shes pa lus las 'pho ba de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig lags /
T02TD1803E:76a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:76a-6: sman chen da ltar khyod kyis nga la ji skad du bskul ba de ni de bzhin te /
T02TD1803E:76a-8: dri ba de ni mchog tu zab po //
T02TD1803E:76a-9: dri ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par bya ba yin te /
T02TD1803E:76a-10: rnam par shes pa de ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan med do //
T02TD1803E:76a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1803E:76a-12: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen ni zab mo'i don zhu ba la mkhas lags te /
T02TD1803E:76a-13: blo zhib cing mdzangs la mkhas pa lags so //
T02TD1803E:76a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:76a-15: bzang skyong de de bzhin te /
T02TD1803E:76a-16: rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:76a-17: bzang skyong rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du gzhan mu stegs can du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
T02TD1803E:76a-18: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci yin /
T02TD1803E:76a-19: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang yin /
T02TD1803E:76a-20: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji lta bu zhig snyam mo //
T02TD1803E:76a-21: bzang skyong 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba khong du ma chud de ngas 'di'i the tshom bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1803E:76a-22: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
T02TD1803E:76a-23: sa bon gyis lus kyi myu gu mngon par grub par byed la /
T02TD1803E:76a-24: sems pas shes pa dran pa thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:76a-25: de bas na sa bon dang shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:76a-32: ka pitta la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni ro du mar 'grub ste /
T02TD1803E:76a-38: bska ba la sogs pa'i ro re rer rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:76a-39: la la ni ro tsha bar 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:76b-0: 'bras bu de dag med par gyur pa'i sa bon gang dang gang du 'pho @76b bar gyur pa de dang der ro yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:76b-1: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der tshor ba yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:76b-2: bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang dran pa yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:76b-3: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis ni lus yongs su btang nas bdag gi lus 'di yongs su gtong ngo snyam du rab tu shes te /
T02TD1803E:76b-4: de bas na 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:76b-5: dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so //
T02TD1803E:76b-6: mi dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so //
T02TD1803E:76b-7: las 'di dag ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //
T02TD1803E:76b-8: bdag kyang 'di dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo snyam du de ltar rab tu shes te de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:76b-9: gzhan yang lus 'di'i bya ba thams cad rab tu shes te de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:76b-10: lus 'di la rnam par shes pa gang na yang mi gnas te /
T02TD1803E:76b-11: rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:76b-12: bzang skyong de'i phyir nyon cig / bden pa ma mthong bas ni rnam par shes pa 'di mi shes so zhes gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:76b-13: de ltar na rnam par shes pa ni kha dog med pa /
T02TD1803E:76b-15: dbyibs med pa'i bdag nyid can rang rig pa'i ye shes tsam du theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las bstan to //
T02TD1803E:76b-16: gzhan yang rdo rje'i theg pa gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la ma zhugs par gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyi bskal pa thams cad kyis kyang rang gi sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid shes par bya bar mi nus shing kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02TD1803E:76b-17: de bas na dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD1803E:76b-18: bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las rnam par shes pa gsum gyi yang dag pa ji lta bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:76b-19: rgyud de las rdo rje lta bu'i tshig bshad pa cung zad gcig la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:76b-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD1803E:76b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas slar yang zhus pa /
T02TD1803E:77a-0: ae ma'o ston pa rnam par shes pa gsum ni rtogs @77a * //
T02TD1803E:77a-1: par dka' zhing mchog tu rtogs par dka' ste /
T02TD1803E:77a-2: rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:77a-3: bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:77a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:77a-5: rnam par shes pa ni 'od gsal ba las byung ba'o //
T02TD1803E:77a-6: de nyid ni sems dang yid ces bya ste /
T02TD1803E:77a-7: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid can gyi chos thams cad ni de'i rtsa ba can yin no //
T02TD1803E:77a-8: de las bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa rnam pa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:77a-9: rnam par shes pa de rlung la zhon te byung /
T02TD1803E:77a-13: de rnams las ni phung po lnga dang /
T02TD1803E:77a-16: de dag thams cad ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa yang dag par 'dre'o //
T02TD1803E:77a-17: de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin snang ba la rab tu spyod pa yongs su gsal bar nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:77a-18: mdor bstan pa'i tshig de rnams kyis rgyas par bshad pa'i bsdus pa bstan bar bya ste /
T02TD1803E:77a-19: de la dang po kho nar rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rnam grangs dag bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:77a-20: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang thabs zhes bya ba'i ming gsal ba'i dgongs pas bshad pa 'dis ma ning gi tshig ni nye bar mtshon pa yin la /
T02TD1803E:77a-21: nye bar thob pa'i ye shes ni gsal ba ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:77a-22: de bas na sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1803E:77a-28: gti mug ces bya ba dang /
T02TD1803E:77a-29: ngo bo nyid gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs theg pa chen po dang thun mong du gyur pa'o //
T02TD1803E:77a-30: rdo rje theg pa 'dir rnam grangs gsungs pa /
T02TD1803E:77a-37: sems dang sems las byung ba dang /
T02TD1803E:77b-0: de ltar sems kyi @77b rnam grangs bstan nas /
T02TD1803E:77b-1: da ni so so rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dag gi sgo la brten nas bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:77b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis sems ni dbyibs dang kha dog dang bral ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can no zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:77b-3: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snang ba'i mtshan nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:77b-4: rjes su myong ba'i mtshan nyid du so sor rtogs par bya'o zhes lung las bstan to //
T02TD1803E:77b-5: de bas na de'i man ngag la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:77b-7: dang po kun du snang ba dang /
T02TD1803E:77b-11: snang ba thob pa zhes bya ba ste snang ba gsum mo //
T02TD1803E:77b-12: de la snang ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
T02TD1803E:77b-13: rnam ba med pa'i rang bzhin lus dang ngag med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:77b-14: ji ltar ston gyi dus su nam mkha' dri ma med pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer snang bar byed pas khyab par byed pa bzhin du rang bzhin gyis gsal ba'i rnam par dngos po ma lus pa thams cad la dmigs pas na snang ba ste /
T02TD1803E:77b-15: 'di ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes rab kyi snang ba stong pa dang po ste /
T02TD1803E:77b-16: aam zhes bya ba ngag gi sgo la brten pa'i sa bon brtan par byed pa'i rgyu ste /
T02TD1803E:77b-17: mos pa chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par mi 'gyur bas de zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs so zhes dmigs par byed cing padma'am /
T02TD1803E:77b-21: 'jam pa'i dngos por sems kyi kun rdzob kyi gzugs gsal ba'o//
T02TD1803E:77b-22: snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
T02TD1803E:77b-23: de yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i rnam pa med pa'i rang bzhin can lus dang ngag med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:77b-24: ji ltar ston ka'i dus su nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis khyab pa bzhin du shin tu gsal zhing dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid du dngos po ma lus par dmigs pa byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang po gnyis pa ste /
T02TD1803E:77b-25: rim pa gnyis pa shin tu stong pa'i mtshan nyid can a'a: zhes bya ba ngag gi sgo la brten pa'i sa bon brtan par byed pa'i rgyu ste /
T02TD1803E:78a-0: mos pa chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par mi 'gyur bas nyi ma'i @78a * //
T02TD1803E:78a-1: dkyil 'khor la brten nas dmigs par byed cing rdo rje rtse lnga pa'am /
T02TD1803E:78a-6: rtsub ba'i rnam pa ni sems las byung ba'i kun rdzob kyi gzugs so //
T02TD1803E:78a-7: snang ba thob pa gang zhe na /
T02TD1803E:78a-8: de bzhin du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dngos po med pa'i gzugs can lus dang ngag med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:78a-9: ji ltar mtshams kyi smag la bab pa'i ngo bor khyab pa phra zhing bdag med pa srog dang rtsol ba mi rgyu bas rgyu ba med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:78a-10: sems med pa mi g-yo ba ngag gi sa bon la brten pa'i sgo yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba 'di ni snang ba thob pa ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid can stong pa chen po ste rnam bar shes pa gsum du bshad do //
T02TD1803E:78a-11: de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi man ngag stong pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02TD1803E:78a-12: da ni ye shes re re 'byung ba la rang bzhin 'byung bar rnam par gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:78a-13: de la shes rab kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1803E:78a-14: 'dod chags dang bral ba bar ma dang /
T02TD1803E:78a-15: shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba dang gang yid kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dag dang mya ngan dang mya ngan bar ma dang /
T02TD1803E:78a-16: shin tu mya ngan du gyur pa dang /
T02TD1803E:78a-41: dogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1803E:78a-44: mtshan nyid sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
T02TD1803E:78a-45: thabs kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni chags pa dang /
T02TD1803E:78b-4: dka' ba la sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1803E:78b-5: dka' ba la sbyor ba bar ma dang /
T02TD1803E:78b-6: shin tu dka' ba la sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1803E:78b-15: nye bar mi len pa dang /
T02TD1803E:78b-24: mtshan nyid bzhi bcu tham pa'o //
T02TD1803E:78b-25: snang ba thob pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD1803E:78b-32: the tshom dang bcas pa ste /
T02TD1803E:78b-33: 'di'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni bdun po 'di dag go //
T02TD1803E:78b-34: rang bzhin rnam pa brgyad cu po de dag gi mtshan nyid ni mngon sum du phye bar gyur na brgya drug cu ste /
T02TD1803E:78b-35: nyin dang mtshan du sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa rnams kyang nyin dang mtshan du spyod de pho dang mo'i skye gnas kyi dbye bas phye ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:78b-36: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:78b-37: rang bzhin rnam pa brgyad cu'i sems nyid dang mtshan du rab tu rgyu ba bdag dang gzhan rnams kyi so so rang rig pa yin pa ni som nyi ma mchis na 'on kyang lung gis yid ches par bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:78b-38: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:78b-39: sngags kyi sgra'i nges pa'i tshig bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:78b-40: rkyen las byung ba gang dang gang //
T02TD1803E:78b-41: dbang po dang ni yul gyis yid //
T02TD1803E:78b-42: yid de man zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD1803E:78b-43: tra ni gsal bar byed pa'i don //
T02TD1803E:78b-45: rang bzhin rnam pa brgyad cu las /
T02TD1803E:78b-46: nyon mongs pa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ba dang /
T02TD1803E:78b-47: yang lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la sogs ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro ;
T02TD1803E:78b-48: / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:78b-49: shes rab dang ston pa'i ye shes ni zla ba lta bu snang ba ston pa nyid tsam mo //
T02TD1803E:78b-50: thabs ye shes kyang nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu shin tu stong pa nyid tsam mo //
T02TD1803E:78b-51: de bzhin du snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes ni mun nag lta bu ste /
T02TD1803E:78b-52: stong pa chen po'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T02TD1803E:79a-0: @79a * // rnam par shes pa gsum po de dag ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can rnam pa med pa'i ngo bor khyab pa 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba'o zhes bshad na /
T02TD1803E:79a-1: ji ltar na nyin dang mtshan du lus las spro zhing sdud par byed /
T02TD1803E:79a-3: su zhig ni sems pa med par byed /
T02TD1803E:79a-6: 'dod chags bar ma la sogs pa rang bzhin brgya drug cu gang las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:79a-7: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:79a-8: rnam par shes pa gsum ni rtsa ba med pa /
T02TD1803E:79a-12: kha dog dang dbyibs med pa /
T02TD1803E:79a-13: dbang po las 'das pa yin par ni bden te /
T02TD1803E:79a-14: de lta mod kyi snang ba dang bcas pa yin la des na rlung gi khams dang lhan cig mel tshe byed de gang gi phyir rlung gi khams ni gzugs med kyang g-yo zhing bskyod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba ston pas rjes su dpag pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:79a-15: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa snang ba yang gzugs med pa la 'dod chags dang /
T02TD1803E:79a-17: 'dod chags bar ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams las rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pas na rjes su dpag par bya ba'o //
T02TD1803E:79a-18: ji skad du rnam par shes pa 'pho ba'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:79a-19: bzang skyong dper na rlung gi khams gzugs can ma yin yang bstan du yod cing gzung du med pa las gzugs su snang ngo //
T02TD1803E:79a-20: de la bstan du yod pa ni shing 'gul zhing g-yo ba dang sgra skad 'ur 'ug po'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:79a-21: grang ba dang dro ba'i reg pas tshor ba skyed pa yin yang de la rkang lag dang mig dang gdong dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:79a-22: sdo bsangs dang dkar ba zhes kha dog lhag par mi dmigs so //
T02TD1803E:79a-23: bzang skyong de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang gzugs su mi dmigs shing gzugs su snang bar mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:79a-24: khyod kyi rgyu'i bye brag dag gis rnam par shes pa'i khams rtogs par bya'o zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD1803E:79a-25: gtan tshigs des na khams phra ba dang /
T02TD1803E:79b-0: rnam par @79b shes pa snang ba dag ni gzugs med pas mar gyi nang du mar bcug pa dang 'dra bar 'dres par gyur nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba thams cad rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:79b-1: ji skad du dgongs pa bla na med pa las /
T02TD1803E:79b-2: rang rig tsam gyi ye shes ni //
T02TD1803E:79b-3: nam mkha' 'dra bar mtshan nyid med //
T02TD1803E:79b-4: 'on kyang de la dbye yod de //
T02TD1803E:79b-5: bar mtshams nyin dang mtshan mo'i bdag / snang ba dang ni snang ba mched //
T02TD1803E:79b-6: de bzhin snang ba thob pa can //
T02TD1803E:79b-7: sems ni rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02TD1803E:79b-8: de yi gzhi ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1803E:79b-9: phra ba'i gzugs can rlung dang ni //
T02TD1803E:79b-10: ye shes dag ni 'dres gyur ba //
T02TD1803E:79b-11: dbar po'i lam nas byung nas ni //
T02TD1803E:79b-12: yul rnams la ni dmigs par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:79b-13: gang tshe snang ba ldan gyur pa //
T02TD1803E:79b-14: rlung gi bzhon par gyur pa yin //
T02TD1803E:79b-15: de tshe rang bzhin de thams cad //
T02TD1803E:79b-16: ma lus lus pa med par 'byung //
T02TD1803E:79b-17: rlung ni gang dang gar gnas pa //
T02TD1803E:79b-18: rang bzhin de dang der rjes spyod //
T02TD1803E:79b-20: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes skad cig mar yang dag pa 'byung ba nam mkha' snang byed lta bu phyogs bcu khyab par rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes dgongs pas bshad pa gsungs pas so //
T02TD1803E:79b-21: ji ltar na ye shes skad cig mar 'byung ba yin zhe na /
T02TD1803E:79b-22: skad cig dang thang cig dang /
T02TD1803E:79b-25: thal mo brdabs pa tsam du snang ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1803E:79b-26: nam mkha' snang byed lta bu zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ni gsal bar byed pas nam mkha' gsal bar byed pa ste /
T02TD1803E:79b-27: don de dang 'dra ba'i don gyis phyogs bcu khyab cing rab tu 'bar ba'i snang ba gsum du snang ste /
T02TD1803E:79b-28: mkha' snang zhes bya ba ni srin bu me khyer ni ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:79b-29: de bas na khams phra ba la 'jug pa las skad cig dang /
T02TD1803E:79b-33: thal mo brdabs par snang ba g-yo ba'o //
T02TD1803E:79b-38: thal mo brdabs pa las rang bzhin rnams rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:79b-39: sems pa med pa gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1803E:80a-0: de bas na ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur @80a * //
T02TD1803E:80a-2: / de nas rlung gi khams kyi rgyus rang bzhin rnams phan tshun gcig la gcig yul gyi longs spyod ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams nyin dang mtshan du rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:80a-3: de ltar na rang bzhin gyi snang ba rlung gi bzhon pa dang bcas pa'i dbye ba rtogs par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'das pa dang /
T02TD1803E:80a-5: da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g-yo ba shes par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:80a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:80a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan no //
T02TD1803E:80a-9: rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud zad pa dang /
T02TD1803E:80a-12: rnam par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te /
T02TD1803E:80a-13: rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag 'byung ba dang /
T02TD1803E:80a-14: rgyu gang dag med pas zad cing bral bar bstan pa dge ba'am /
T02TD1803E:80a-17: lung du ma bstan pa de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas /
T02TD1803E:80a-19: gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so //
T02TD1803E:80a-20: da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud du 'byung ba dge ba 'am /
T02TD1803E:80a-23: lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
T02TD1803E:80a-24: sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas /
T02TD1803E:80a-26: gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so //
T02TD1803E:80a-27: gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang /
T02TD1803E:80a-28: sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba'am /
T02TD1803E:80a-31: lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
T02TD1803E:80a-32: sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas yul phyogs dang bcas /
T02TD1803E:80a-33: gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so //
T02TD1803E:80b-0: rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @80b bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan pa yin no zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD1803E:80b-1: rigs pa 'dis na thugs kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i ye shes can gyis smon pa po dang /
T02TD1803E:80b-3: smon par bya ba la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi dngos po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa spangs nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:80b-4: rtsa ba'i rgyud las rigs kyi bu mnyam par gzhag pas rang gi sems la so sor rtogs shig ces gsungs pas so //
T02TD1803E:80b-5: de ltar bshad pa'i rgyud la brten nas rang gi rang bzhin snang ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma rtogs par las su smra ba'i sems can rnams /
T02TD1803E:80b-6: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas rang gi sems rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas dar gyi srin bu bzhin du rang nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas skye ba gcig nas gcig tu nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba dang /
T02TD1803E:80b-7: mi dge ba'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong nas yang don dam pa'i bden pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i rim gyis phung po yongs su spangs te /
T02TD1803E:80b-8: rlung gi khams kyis blangs nas tshor ba dang ldan zhing sred pas rjes su bcings la /
T02TD1803E:80b-9: chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i dran pas yongs su bzung ba /
T02TD1803E:80b-10: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
T02TD1803E:80b-11: byis pa lo lnga pa dang mnyam pa thams cad mthong ba /
T02TD1803E:80b-12: dbang po thams cad tshang ba /
T02TD1803E:80b-14: rdo rje la sogs pas kyang mi bzlogs la mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa /
T02TD1803E:80b-15: las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs dang ldan pa /
T02TD1803E:80b-16: nyi ma bdun gyis 'ong ba'i bar la gnas nas rang gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i las dge ba dang mi dge bas bskal par gyur pas rgyu dang rkyen thob nas 'gro ba lnga rnams su /
T02TD1803E:80b-17: zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi tshul gyis yang dang yang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed cing /
T02TD1803E:80b-18: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:80b-19: sems rnam par dpen pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1803E:80b-21: // / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:81a-1: 'das rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa gzhan dag kyang zhu bar 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:81a-2: bcom ldan 'das gal te rnam par shes pa gsum gyi snang ba ni gzugs med pa yin la rlung gi khams kyang gzugs med pa yin zhing las kyang gzugs med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:81a-3: de bzhin du 'di rnams kyi phan tshun shes pa med pas //
T02TD1803E:81a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis lung gi tshig las stong pa nyid du gsungs na /
T02TD1803E:81a-5: de ji ltar na las dge ba dang mi dge bas 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus de bcings par ma gyur /
T02TD1803E:81a-6: de bzhin du rang bzhin brgya drug cu po 'di rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams nye bar bsags nas de 'di nyid skad cig thang cig tu skye zhing rab tu 'jig par 'gyur na des ji ltar na yang nas yang du 'jig rten pha rol tu nye bar dmigs par 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:81a-7: yang na dge ba dang mi dge ba de dag gzhan dag las mchi bar 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:81a-8: yang na rang gi sems kyi bag chags las 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags /
T02TD1803E:81a-9: bdag gi 'gyod pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas rnam par bsal du gsol /
T02TD1803E:81a-10: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:81a-11: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:81a-12: las rnam par dag pa yongs su shes par bya ba shin tu yang zab pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul te /
T02TD1803E:81a-13: rigs kyi bu 'di ni las dang po pa rnams dang las su smra ba rnams kyis ma yin no //
T02TD1803E:81a-14: de bas na lung dang rigs pa dag gis las rnam par dag pa so sor rtogs par bya yis rab tu 'bad pas nyon cig / de la dang po kho nar las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:81a-15: de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /
T02TD1803E:81a-16: de las bzlog pa ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams te /
T02TD1803E:81a-17: las kyi lam 'di rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid las kun du byung ba'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud las gsungs pas de la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:81a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:81a-19: gsang ba'i bdag po nyon cig / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum mo //
T02TD1803E:81b-0: ngag gi nyes par @81b spyod pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD1803E:81b-1: yid kyi nyes par spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1803E:81b-2: de dag gis sems can bmyal [*dmyal?] bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:81b-3: phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:81b-4: lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba dang /
T02TD1803E:81b-5: yid kyi nyes par spyod pa du zhig mchis pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:81b-6: bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:81b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:81b-8: gsang ba'i bdag po nyes par spyod pa de nyid ni lci bar 'gyur pa dang /
T02TD1803E:81b-10: de la pha dang ma dang /
T02TD1803E:81b-11: bla mar gyur pa la sogs pa la gsod pa dang brdeg pa la sogs pa ni nyes par spyod pa lci ba'o //
T02TD1803E:81b-12: srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams ni nyes par spyod pa tha mal pa'o //
T02TD1803E:81b-13: ngag gis nyes par spyod pa gang zhe na /
T02TD1803E:81b-14: dam pa'i chos spong ba'i tshig smra ba nyid kyis ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i tshig nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:81b-15: pha dang ma dang bla mar gyur pa la sogs pa rnams la tshig ngan par smras pa ni ngag gi nyes par spyod pa lci ba'o //
T02TD1803E:81b-16: skyes bu 'ga' zhig gang zag dad pa can gzhan dag nan tan nyams su len cing dge ba rtsom pa'i gtam gyi skabs su 'jig rten pha rol med do zhes bya ba'i rgya che ba'i tshig 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brdzun smra bas dge ba'i las kyi bar chad byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:81b-19: mi dge ba'i las kyi gtam rnams ni ngag gi nyes par spyod pa tha mal pa'o //
T02TD1803E:81b-20: yid kyi nyes par spyod pa ni ;
T02TD1803E:81b-21: gang dang por ni rmugs pa ste /
T02TD1803E:81b-22: de nyid kyi rang bzhin ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sems kyi nyes par spyod pa dang /
T02TD1803E:81b-23: sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi nyes par spyod pa dang /
T02TD1803E:81b-24: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi nyes par spyod pa'o //
T02TD1803E:81b-25: phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:81b-26: sems dang sems las byung ba dang /
T02TD1803E:81b-27: ma rig pa'i nyes par spyod pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:81b-28: bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:81b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:82a-0: gsang ba'i bdag po nyon cig / rnam par gsod pa'i sems dang ma chags pa'i sems de dang dge ba @82a * //
T02TD1803E:82a-1: bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la ma chags pa de nyid ni sems kyi nyes par spyod pa'o //
T02TD1803E:82a-6: sems can rnam par 'jig pa dang /
T02TD1803E:82a-7: 'dod chags kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi bud med la chags pa dang ;
T02TD1803E:82a-9: bla mar gyur pa la sems gya gyu zhing rab tu sdang ba ni sems las byung ba'i nyes par spyod pa'o //
T02TD1803E:82a-10: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /
T02TD1803E:82a-11: pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par 'dor zhing brjed ngas pa dang /
T02TD1803E:82a-12: som nyi mtshan ma'i gdong dang /
T02TD1803E:82a-13: yid shin tu rmongs par gyur pas na ma rig pa'i nyes par spyod pa tha mal pa'o //
T02TD1803E:82a-14: de ltar 'di dag ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'o zhes mi shes shing rang nyid kyis rang bzhin gyi snang ba rlung gi bzhon pa'i rang bzhin can ma shes nas nga'i lus dang /
T02TD1803E:82a-16: nga'i sems yin no zhes bdag tu rlom pa dang /
T02TD1803E:82a-17: ngar sems pas las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas nas bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:82a-18: rang bzhin snang ba'i rim gyis sems rnam par dben pa rtogs pa'i ye shes can ni lus dang /
T02TD1803E:82a-20: yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang /
T02TD1803E:82a-21: nyes par spyod par sems par mi byed cing rtogs par mi byed de /
T02TD1803E:82a-23: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rang bzhin ni stong pa gsum las kun du byung ba rlung gi bzhon pa'i dbang gis skad cig thang cig la 'byung zhing /
T02TD1803E:82a-24: yul rnams rjes su myong nas yong nas yang du 'od gsal bar 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:82a-26: dgongs pa bla na med pa las /
T02TD1803E:82a-27: ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs shing //
T02TD1803E:82a-28: mdog dang dbyibs ni tha dad pa //
T02TD1803E:82a-29: nam mkha'i dbyings su byung nas ni //
T02TD1803E:82a-30: de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:82a-31: de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad ni //
T02TD1803E:82a-32: snang ba gsum gyi rgyu can te //
T02TD1803E:82a-33: ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni //
T02TD1803E:82a-35: de 'dra'i rang bzhin ma shes pas //
T02TD1803E:82a-36: mi shes mun pas khebs pa rnams //
T02TD1803E:82a-37: dge dang mi dge'i las byas nas //
T02TD1803E:82b-0: mtshams med la sogs @82b byas nas ni //
T02TD1803E:82b-2: sbyin sogs dge ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1803E:82b-3: mtho ris la sogs dag tu mchod //
T02TD1803E:82b-4: skye ba dpag med stong phrag ni //
T02TD1803E:82b-5: 'di ni yang dag yang thob pa //
T02TD1803E:82b-6: 'di ni sngon las rnam smin zhes //
T02TD1803E:82b-7: rmongs pa rnams ni mya ngan byed //
T02TD1803E:82b-8: rang bzhin snang ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1803E:82b-9: gang gis skye bo nyon mongs pa //
T02TD1803E:82b-10: de nyid shes nas ye shes can //
T02TD1803E:82b-11: srid pa'i gzeb las grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:82b-13: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:82b-14: sems kyi spyod pa rnams ni 'dus ma byas pa gzugs can ma yin pa las ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbye bas rlung yang thogs pa med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:82b-15: 'jig rten thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin shes pa de ni rnam par dag pa yin pas na nyon mongs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba mi srid do zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD1803E:82b-16: yang rigs pa 'dis sems rnam par dben pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen pos dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la ltos pa med par thar pa la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:82b-17: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gcod pa las /
T02TD1803E:82b-18: chos kyang spang bar byan chos ma yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:82b-19: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen po las kyang /
T02TD1803E:82b-20: dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam //
T02TD1803E:82b-21: byed pa ye shes spangs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:82b-23: de ltar na sems can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas rang gi sems ji lta ba nyid yongs su shes pa ma rtogs pas ngar 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:82b-26: gsog la brtags nas dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs par brtags pas 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba yin no //
T02TD1803E:82b-27: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi le'u las /
T02TD1803E:82b-29: bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dben pa dang stong pa lags na /
T02TD1803E:82b-30: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa gda' bar 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:83a-2: bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:83a-3: rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:83a-4: bcom ldan 'das stong pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:83a-5: rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:83a-6: bcom ldan 'das dben pa'am stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyal /
T02TD1803E:83a-8: stong pa nyid las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'am /
T02TD1803E:83a-9: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
T02TD1803E:83a-10: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis na /
T02TD1803E:83a-11: bcom ldan 'das bshad pa de'i don ji lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi /
T02TD1803E:83a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol /
T02TD1803E:83a-13: bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol /
T02TD1803E:83a-14: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T02TD1803E:83a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD1803E:83a-16: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T02TD1803E:83a-17: sems can rnams ni yun ring po nas ngar 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:83a-18: nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod dam /
T02TD1803E:83a-20: bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no //
T02TD1803E:83a-21: bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te /
T02TD1803E:83a-22: sems can rnams ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:83a-23: nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod do //
T02TD1803E:83a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:83a-25: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T02TD1803E:83a-27: nga yir 'dzin pa stong pa yin mod /
T02TD1803E:83a-29: bcom ldan 'das stong pa lags so //
T02TD1803E:83a-30: bde bar gshegs pa stong pa lags so //
T02TD1803E:83a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:83a-32: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems ngar 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:83a-33: nga yir 'dzin pas sems can rnams 'khor ba na 'khor ram /
T02TD1803E:83a-35: bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no //
T02TD1803E:83a-36: bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te /
T02TD1803E:83a-38: nga yir 'dzin pas sems can rnams 'khor ba na 'khor ro //
T02TD1803E:83a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:83a-40: rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par yang snang ngo //
T02TD1803E:83b-0: rnam par byang bar @83b yang snang ngo zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:83b-1: de bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:83b-2: dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems /
T02TD1803E:83b-3: ci skye ba med pa skye ba'am /
T02TD1803E:83b-8: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
T02TD1803E:83b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:83b-10: dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems /
T02TD1803E:83b-11: ci skye ba med pa'i chos rnams sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram /
T02TD1803E:83b-13: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ram /
T02TD1803E:83b-15: bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa nyid kyang ma mchis pa lags na /
T02TD1803E:83b-16: ngan 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis /
T02TD1803E:83b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:83b-18: dge slong de ltar chos thams cad ni de ltar 'od gsal ba yin na yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la brtags /
T02TD1803E:83b-21: gsog lta bu'i chos thams cad la brtags pas /
T02TD1803E:83b-22: sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:83b-23: dge slong ci de ltar sems kun nas nyon mongs pas sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ram /
T02TD1803E:83b-24: sems rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:83b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:83b-26: chos thams cad la dad pa med pas mngon par dang cing lhag par mos na des ni sems can de ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi smra'o //
T02TD1803E:83b-28: nyon mongs pa rnams la phung po med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:83b-29: nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dben pa las rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa dang phrad pa las skye bar 'gyur la /
T02TD1803E:83b-30: skyes pa tsam gyis 'gag par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:83b-31: gang skye ba dang 'jig pa de ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jig pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:83b-32: klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis don 'di gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:83b-33: gal te 'di kun stong pa dang //
T02TD1803E:83b-34: skye med ngo bo nyid yin na //
T02TD1803E:84a-0: bdag tu rlom par gyur ma thag / de @84a * //
T02TD1803E:84a-2: brtags pas gzhan gyi dbang gyur pas //
T02TD1803E:84a-3: byis pa sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs //
T02TD1803E:84a-4: 'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste //
T02TD1803E:84a-5: sgyu ma'i rnam par yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1803E:84a-6: de nas dge dang mi dge'i las //
T02TD1803E:84a-9: de ltar na rigs pa 'dis lung dang rigs pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can thams cad kyis sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi dba' klong du lhung bar gyur cing skyabs med pa dpung gnyen med pa rnams la gzigs nas kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul gyis nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par mdzad cing /
T02TD1803E:84a-10: kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang don dam pa'i bden pas rnam par sbyangs nas yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog par mdzad pa yin no ;
T02TD1803E:84a-11: / las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u lnga pa'o /
T02TD1803E:84a-13: // / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:84a-14: khyed kyi zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis bshad ma thag pa'i gsung rab kyi rjes su 'brangs nas lus dang dag dang sems kyi mtshan nyid la so sor brtags pas nges par 'tshal te /
T02TD1803E:84a-15: ting nge 'dzin gzhan gyi khyad par yang rje btsun gyi zhal snga nas gsol nas gong nas gong du ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par zhu bar 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:84a-16: bskyed pa'i rim pa nas brtsams te lus rnam par dben pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du rdo rje gsum la sogs pas kyang mtshan nyid la lhag par mos pa tsam lags te /
T02TD1803E:84a-17: de bas na lus rnam par dben pa la yang lha'i gzugs med de /
T02TD1803E:84a-18: lus ni rdul phra rab bsags pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:84a-19: ngag rnam par dben pa'i mthar thug pa yang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje bzlas pa tsam yongs su shes pa ste /
T02TD1803E:84a-20: de la yang lha'i rnam pa med de sgra rnams ni brag ca lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:84a-21: sems rnam par dben pa'i mthar thug pa yang rang bzhin gyis snang ba tsam yongs su shes pa tsam du zad pas der yang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lha'i sku'i ngo bor rnyed par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:84b-0: @84b sems ni snang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:84b-1: rigs pa 'dis ni kun rdzob la brten nas gnas pa rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:84b-2: de bas na ye shes tsam gyis lha nyid du bskyed pa slob dpon gyi zhal snga las rtogs par bgyid 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:84b-3: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:84b-4: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:84b-5: lha'i de kho na nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa las 'ongs pa /
T02TD1803E:84b-6: sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyi yang yul ma yin pa de ngas khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:84b-7: rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la yang med pa /
T02TD1803E:84b-8: ye shes tsam du yongs su snang ba tsam gyis mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i skur gzung ba de yang sgyu ma dang /
T02TD1803E:84b-9: rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpe rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sku yin no //
T02TD1803E:84b-10: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:84b-11: brten pa'i lus med par sems kyi rang bzhin yang med pa /
T02TD1803E:84b-12: sems med par yang lus dmigs su med do zhes lung gi tshig las gsungs na /
T02TD1803E:84b-13: de ji ltar na sems 'ba' zhig tsam gyis phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i sku rdzogs par 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:84b-14: dmigs pa'i lta ba can rnams ni lung dang rtogs pa med par yid ches par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:84b-15: de bas na de rnams dmigs su med pa'i lha'i de kho na nyid bde blag tu mngon du bya ba'i thabs bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:84b-16: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:84b-17: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:84b-18: gang mdo sde la sogs pa'i tshul la zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:84b-19: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i sgom pa po rnams kyang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02TD1803E:84b-21: gzugs brnyan lta bu zhes dper brjod cing lhag par mos kyang de rnams dpes bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag shes tsam gyis yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lha'i sku rdzogs par 'gyur ba shes par ni mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:85a-0: de bas na ngas rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rdo rje sems dpa' rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i @85a * //
T02TD1803E:85a-1: rgyu dang rkyen khyod la khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:85a-2: bden par na sems ni dbyibs dang kha dog dang bral ba snang ba tsam nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid don dam pa'i bden pa dang 'dra bar reg par dka' ba'o //
T02TD1803E:85a-3: de lta mod kyi snang ba tsam gyi snang ba gsum po rlung la brten par gyur pa dang /
T02TD1803E:85a-4: thun mong du gyur pas yang ba ste /
T02TD1803E:85a-5: de bas na rlung gis rnam par shes pa bcings pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:85a-6: de nas shes rab dang thams kyi snang ba gnyis 'od zer lnga dang bcas shing sna tshogs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i lha'i sku 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:85a-7: 'di'i bzhon pa gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1803E:85a-8: rlung zhes bya ba ste sems rdo rje gang yin pa de lta bu'i rlung la zhon nas /
T02TD1803E:85a-9: gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:85a-10: rnam par shes pa 'pho ba'i mdo las kyang gsal bar gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:85a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:85a-12: sman chen ngas tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don gyi phyir brag gi rtse mo nas lus bor te dka' ba rnam pa brgya stong du ma nyams su myong ngo //
T02TD1803E:85a-13: sman chen khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
T02TD1803E:85a-14: ngas khyod la lan gdab bo /
T02TD1803E:85a-15: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
T02TD1803E:85a-16: bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1803E:85a-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di'i rang bzhin ci lags /
T02TD1803E:85a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:85a-19: sman chen sgyu ma mkhan gyi mi'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:85a-20: mi'i grib mchu'i nang du 'byung ba gsal ba ma yin zhing mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:85a-21: mig dang nam mkha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang ;
T02TD1803E:85a-22: srid pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de bzhin no //
T02TD1803E:85a-23: gang yang sman chen khyod kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyis ji ltar thog mar 'chi bas byas pa'i gzugs blta bar bya zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:85a-25: chu'i nang du byung ba'i skyes bu'i grib ma'i gzugs bzhin du blta bar bya'i de'i nang du byung ba'i snang ba bzhin du ni blta bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1803E:85a-26: yang sman chen de'i mgo bo dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang ldan par gyur pa yang chu'i nang du byung ba'i skyes bu nyid bzhin no //
T02TD1803E:85a-27: de la ni grang ba'am dro ba'am lus dub pa la sogs pa med de /
T02TD1803E:85a-28: de la sha dang nya sha la sogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1803E:85b-0: @85b grib ma ni khams kyis rnam par gzhig mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:85b-1: de na chu'i nang du byung ba'i skyes bu'i gzugs brnyan ni bde ba'i sgra'am sdug bsngal ba'i sgra brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:85b-2: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang thog mar 'chi ba'i lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su spangs nas des byas pa'i gzugs su gyur pa'o //
T02TD1803E:85b-3: de ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo srid pa bar ma pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:85b-4: de nyis bla ma brgyud pa'i rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi man ngag thob pa rnams ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba 'di ltar rtsig pa'i ras ris me long gi nang du nye bar snang ba de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid kyis bdag nyid sprul te /
T02TD1803E:85b-5: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa sku blta bas chog mi shes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pas lus la brgyan pa ste /
T02TD1803E:85b-6: mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan pa zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T02TD1803E:85b-7: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:85b-8: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i lus ngag ni //
T02TD1803E:85b-9: de nyid bsgoms pas thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:85b-12: 'ja' tshon zhes bya ba ni lha'i dbang po'i gzhu ste /
T02TD1803E:85b-14: dngos su 'od zer lngas nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02TD1803E:85b-15: ji ltar 'ja' tshon nam mkha'i dkyil na kha dog lnga'i dbye ba yongs su gsal ba yin te /
T02TD1803E:85b-16: lus kyang de dang 'dra bar nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:85b-17: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i lus dag ni //
T02TD1803E:85b-19: de nyid bsgoms pas thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:85b-20: zhes bya ba ni bla ma las man ngag yang dag par thob nas de kho na nyid bsgom zhing don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pas 'thob pa'i don to //
T02TD1803E:85b-21: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:85b-22: bcom ldan 'das so ma nyir gyur pa gzhan 'ga' zhig bdag la mchis te /
T02TD1803E:85b-23: ci'i phyir yun ring por gnyid log nas ci'i phyir lus kyi khog pa bor te /
T02TD1803E:85b-24: rmi lam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas sam /
T02TD1803E:85b-25: yul phyogs gzhan dag tu song nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nyams su myong ste /
T02TD1803E:86a-0: yang yul 'dir 'ongs nas ci'i phyir rmi lam na dge ba dang mi dge ba @86a * //
T02TD1803E:86a-2: de bzhin du gnyid log pa'am /
T02TD1803E:86a-3: gnyid ma log pa'i gnas skabs dag ci tha dad par mchis sam /
T02TD1803E:86a-5: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:86a-6: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:86a-7: thog ma med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi lus la dngos por blta nas 'dzin pa rnams kyi the tshom bsal ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1803E:86a-8: bdag la byin gyis brlab par bshad pa rnam par gsal ba bya ba'i phyir rmi lam gyi mtshan nyid yongs su 'dri bar byed pa legs su legs so //
T02TD1803E:86a-9: de bas na rmi lam gyi sgo nas gzugs brnyan du bshad pa'i lha'i sku thams cad kyi so so rang rig par gyur pa rgyud dang mdo sde rnams kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rab tu rtogs par bya yis rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis nyon cig / phung po khams dang skye mched dbang sogs la //
T02TD1803E:86a-10: shes pa gnyis po de 'dir rab tu 'dus nas //
T02TD1803E:86a-11: stong chen gyur ba gang zhig gnyid log pa //
T02TD1803E:86a-12: rlung gi shugs kyis rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:86a-13: rmi lam sad la bye brag gzhan med par //
T02TD1803E:86a-14: kun tu rtog pas rmi lam 'bras 'dod pas //
T02TD1803E:86a-15: 'gro ba nyin mtshan nye bar gnyid log cing //
T02TD1803E:86a-16: sa mthug gyur pas rab tu ring gnyid log /'bras bu ma smin byas pa'i las rnams kyis //
T02TD1803E:86a-17: skye 'dir rlung ni slar yang 'jug par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:86a-18: 'bras bu smin par gyur na rlung 'di nyid //
T02TD1803E:86a-20: ji ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po //
T02TD1803E:86a-21: de yi sku la rkang rus sha med kyang //
T02TD1803E:86a-22: sems can phan phyir khams la 'jug mdzad cing //
T02TD1803E:86a-23: sbrul pa'i sku yis bya ba mdzad pa yin //
T02TD1803E:86a-24: rim pa de bzhin gnyid log sad pa'i sems /
T02TD1803E:86a-25: 'bras bu 'dod pa'i rnam rtog dra ba can //
T02TD1803E:86a-26: de bas chos kun rmi lam lta bu ste //
T02TD1803E:86a-27: bden dang brdzun pa dag kyang yod ma yin //
T02TD1803E:86a-29: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:86a-30: dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems /
T02TD1803E:86b-0: ci khyod kyis gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na kun du rtog @86b pa'i tshe 'dod chags spyod pa myong ngam /
T02TD1803E:86b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:86b-4: dge slong sems kyis 'dod chags spyod par khyod kyis mi shes sam /
T02TD1803E:86b-6: bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta bu lags so //
T02TD1803E:86b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:86b-8: dge slong ci khyod kyis rmi lam gyi sems dang /
T02TD1803E:86b-9: gnyid ma log pa'i sems 'di la bye brag dang tha dad du bya ba zhig yod par mthong ngam /
T02TD1803E:86b-11: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni rmi lam gyi sems dang gnyid ma log pa'i sems la tha dad du bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mthong lags so //
T02TD1803E:86b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1803E:86b-13: dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems /
T02TD1803E:86b-14: chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'o zhes ngam ma bstan tam /
T02TD1803E:86b-16: bcom ldan 'das de ni de ltar lags so zhes gsol pa dang /
T02TD1803E:86b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1803E:86b-18: kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste /
T02TD1803E:86b-19: dper na byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas lta bu ste /
T02TD1803E:86b-20: byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas /
T02TD1803E:86b-23: chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba yang med de /
T02TD1803E:86b-24: 'di ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i gnas de yin no //
T02TD1803E:86b-25: kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam 'di ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
T02TD1803E:86b-26: mi yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong ngo snyam du mi sems te /
T02TD1803E:86b-27: khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu rmi lam dang 'dra ba rmi lam las byung ba'o //
T02TD1803E:86b-28: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang /
T02TD1803E:87a-0: sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang rmi lam ltar bdag med pa'i gnas su rig par bya'o zhes @87a * //
T02TD1803E:87a-2: sgyur ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1803E:87a-3: sems dang sems las byung ba'i rnal 'byor chen po ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1803E:87a-4: de ni sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02TD1803E:87a-5: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangga'i klung gi bya ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02TD1803E:87a-16: me long gi gzugs brnyan te /
T02TD1803E:87a-17: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par 'gyur ba yin te /
T02TD1803E:87a-18: de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor ba ji srid pa'i bar du sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol par mdzad cing dga' bar mdzad pas yongs su spyod par mdzad la /
T02TD1803E:87a-19: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas bdag nyid bzhed pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:87a-20: de ltar dus gsum gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran nas rnam par grol bar 'dod pas rdo rje slob dpon 'bad pas mnyes par byas la bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag thob nas /
T02TD1803E:87a-21: de rnam par dag pa'i thabs btsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1803E:87a-22: kun rdzob kyi bden pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u drug pa'o /
T02TD1803E:87a-24: // / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:87a-25: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la ni som nyi ma mchis na /
T02TD1803E:87a-26: da ni snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas don dam pa'i bden pa'i cha bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis ches shes par 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:87a-27: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:87b-0: kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya ba ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i skur rdzogs pa ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis rab tu bstan pa nus kyi don dam pa'i bden @87b pa ni yang lus med pa /
T02TD1803E:87b-2: rtsom pa thams cad dang bral ba so so rang gis rig pa ste /
T02TD1803E:87b-3: de bas na bla ma'i kha las bstan pa med par shes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:87b-4: ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshig las kyang /
T02TD1803E:87b-5: ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas //
T02TD1803E:87b-6: phyi rol du ni snang mi 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:87b-7: bum pa de nyid bcag gyur na //
T02TD1803E:87b-9: de bzhin bum pa rang lus nyid //
T02TD1803E:87b-10: de nyid mar me lta bu nyid //
T02TD1803E:87b-11: bla ma'i kha yis legs bcag na //
T02TD1803E:87b-12: sangs rgyas ye shes gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:87b-13: nam mkha' las ni nam mkha' 'byung //
T02TD1803E:87b-14: mkha' yis nam mkha' mthong 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD1803E:87b-15: de nyid bla ma'i kha nyid las //
T02TD1803E:87b-16: sbyor ba legs par ston pa yin //
T02TD1803E:87b-18: rigs pa 'dis na sgra'i rnam pa las byung ba yin pas thog ma dang tha ma med cing /
T02TD1803E:87b-19: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sgra gang yin pa'i sgo nas rab tu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1803E:87b-20: don dam pa'i bden pa de yang ma bcos pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid de don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshul gcig par bstan pa'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:87b-21: chos 'di sgra skad dag gis lung bstan te //
T02TD1803E:87b-22: chos dang sgra dag 'dir ni rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:87b-23: chos nyid tshul gcig dngos la'ang 'jug byed pa //
T02TD1803E:87b-24: bzod mchog bla na med la reg par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:87b-26: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med par khong du chud pa'i slob mas bla mas bstan pa'i lung thob nas rgyud las ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD1803E:87b-27: 'byor pa ci yod pas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor byas la nam phyed na legs par bslabs pa'i phyag rgya lus dri zhim pos byugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bla ma la phul te /
T02TD1803E:87b-28: gsang ba dang de las gzhan pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod la bla ma'i mdun du pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02TD1803E:87b-29: thal mo sbyar ba byas la 'khor ba las skyob pa'i yid kyis slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum bzhin du lhag par mos pa dang /
T02TD1803E:88a-1: mngon par byang chub par gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:88a-2: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD1803E:88a-3: yang dag mtha' gyur khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1803E:88a-4: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1803E:88a-6: mngon par byang chub mthong ba ni //
T02TD1803E:88a-7: slob dpon chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:88a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che //
T02TD1803E:88a-9: thams cad stong pa bla na med //
T02TD1803E:88a-10: rang myong mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid //
T02TD1803E:88a-11: sems dpa' chen po stsal du gsol //
T02TD1803E:88a-12: las dang skye las rnam grol pa'i //
T02TD1803E:88a-14: khyed zhabs padma spangs nas ni //
T02TD1803E:88a-15: gtso bo gzhan du skyabs ma mchis //
T02TD1803E:88a-16: 'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen po //
T02TD1803E:88a-17: de bas sangs rgyas mchog mnyes mdzod //
T02TD1803E:88a-18: de ltar gsol ba'i chog mchog / dam pa de ni thos gyur nas //
T02TD1803E:88a-19: bla ma dpal ldan yon tan mtsho //
T02TD1803E:88a-20: snying rje slob ma la skyed la //
T02TD1803E:88a-21: bzhin ni rab tu dang gyur pas //
T02TD1803E:88a-22: rang gi brtse bas rab dga' zhing //
T02TD1803E:88a-23: rnal 'byor rgyud las byung ba'i mchog / dam tshig bzang po bstan par bya //
T02TD1803E:88a-24: de nas slob dpon snyoms zhugs nas //
T02TD1803E:88a-25: bum pa'am yang na dung chos su //
T02TD1803E:88a-26: byang chub sems ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD1803E:88a-27: de nas slob ma de bos te //
T02TD1803E:88a-28: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs la /
T02TD1803E:88a-29: rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar bcas pa yis //
T02TD1803E:88a-30: dam tshig dag ni bstan par bya //
T02TD1803E:88a-31: rdo rje can ni gnyis pa yis //
T02TD1803E:88a-32: dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1803E:88a-33: bkra shis sgra ni bsgrags pa dang //
T02TD1803E:88a-34: rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD1803E:88a-35: khams gsum pa yi dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1803E:88a-36: slob ma 'dud cing thal sbyor ba //
T02TD1803E:88a-37: der ni rab tu bskul ba yis //
T02TD1803E:88a-38: rjes su gnang ba de nas sbyin //
T02TD1803E:88a-39: phreng ba chu dang rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1803E:88a-40: rdo rje dril bu me long dang /
T02TD1803E:88a-41: ming dang slob dpon rjes gnang ste /
T02TD1803E:88a-42: dbang bskur rim pa 'di yin no //
T02TD1803E:88a-43: de nas byang chub mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1803E:88a-44: bla ma brgyud rim las 'ongs pa /
T02TD1803E:88a-45: man ngag gi ni gzhi thob pa //
T02TD1803E:88a-46: de nas de la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1803E:88a-47: de la mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ni rnam pa gnyis te //
T02TD1803E:88a-48: 'di lta ste phyi dang nang gi'o //
T02TD1803E:88a-49: de la dang por phyi'i bstan par bya ste //
T02TD1803E:88b-0: tho rangs kyi thun mtshams su @88b ma rig pa'i snang ba 'das nas ji srid nyi ma gsal bar ma gyur pa ste /
T02TD1803E:88b-1: 'di la ni 'od gsal ba dri ma med pa'i rnam pa gsal zhing lus dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02TD1803E:88b-2: nyi ma shar ba ni snang ba mched pa'o //
T02TD1803E:88b-3: nyi ma nub pa'i thun mtshams su ma rig pa'o //
T02TD1803E:88b-4: zla ba shar ba'i tshe ni snang ba'o //
T02TD1803E:88b-5: de ltar stong pa nyid rnam pa bzhi phyi rol la nges par bstan pa bshad nas /
T02TD1803E:88b-6: da ni nang gi mngon par byang chub pa so so rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid can rim pa 'dis bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:88b-7: dang por smig rgyu lta bu la 'od zer lnga'i tshogs dang ldan par mthong ngo //
T02TD1803E:88b-8: gnyis pa ni snang ba ste /
T02TD1803E:88b-10: gsum pa ni snang ba mched pa ste nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu'o //
T02TD1803E:88b-11: bzhi pa ni snang ba thob pa ste mun pa lta bu'o //
T02TD1803E:88b-12: de nas mun pa dang bral ba'i skad cig la 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1803E:88b-13: shin tu gsal ba rtag tu snang ba'i mtshan nyid can don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ye shes kyi mig gis mthong ngo //
T02TD1803E:88b-14: de ltar thams cad stong pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas rim pa 'dis bsam gtan rnam pa nyid la dmigs par byed do //
T02TD1803E:88b-15: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:88b-16: chu po'am lteng ka'i chu ni dri med dag la gor bu gnas pa ltar //
T02TD1803E:88b-17: de bzhin de la rim gyis rjes su gzhig par byed pas rnal 'byor bas ni rtag tu bsam //
T02TD1803E:88b-18: me long la ni rlung dag rim gyis zad par byed pa bzhin du'ang blta bya ste //
T02TD1803E:88b-19: ril por 'dzin la'ang bya ba'i rim pa 'dir ni de bzhin yang dag brtag / da ni ming la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyis 'khrul pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa'i ming gi rnam grangs 'ga' zhig la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:88b-20: de la dang por ni 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD1803E:88b-24: bla na med pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-5: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-14: dmigs pa dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-15: rnam par mi shes pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-24: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-25: rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-31: ring ba ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-32: nye ba ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-33: gcig pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-34: tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-36: rnam par bsgom par dka' ba dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-41: chags pa med pa'i mtha' dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-48: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-49: lta ba rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-50: rgyu rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-51: 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-52: khams gsum rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-53: bsod nams rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-54: sdig pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-55: nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-56: las rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-57: skye ba rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-58: de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-59: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-61: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-62: lam gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-64: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-66: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-67: ye shes 'ba' zhig pa nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-68: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89a-69: nyan thos thams cad kyi yum dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-0: rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskrun @89b pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-2: lha'i mig rnam par dag par byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-3: lha'i rnam ba rab tu ster bar byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-4: gzhan gyi sems shes par byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-5: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-6: rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med par byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par byed pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:89b-8: de bzhin du gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1803E:89b-9: dngos po med pa sgom pa'i dngos //
T02TD1803E:89b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa byang chub kyi sems drug gi tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-11: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gzhan dag las kyang /
T02TD1803E:89b-12: yan lag kun bsgom las 'das shing //
T02TD1803E:89b-13: rtog dang rnam rtog spangs nas kyang //
T02TD1803E:89b-14: gug skyed thig le las 'das pa //
T02TD1803E:89b-16: sems can thams cad 'jug pa ni //
T02TD1803E:89b-17: gzugs dang gzugs med dri med la //
T02TD1803E:89b-18: sems ni bskul zhing rtogs byas pa'i //
T02TD1803E:89b-20: yod dang med pa gnyi ga mtha' yin te //
T02TD1803E:89b-21: dag dang ma dag 'di yang mtha' nyid yin //
T02TD1803E:89b-22: de bas mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas ni //
T02TD1803E:89b-23: mkhas pa dbus la gnas par mi byed do //
T02TD1803E:89b-25: nam mkha' mtha' med brtag pa'i don //
T02TD1803E:89b-26: sems can kun gyi gnas chen po //
T02TD1803E:89b-28: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa //
T02TD1803E:89b-30: dngos pas bshad pa'i tshig mang po'i ming gi rnam grangs bsdus pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD1803E:89b-31: ji srid chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sgra'i don dka' ba dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-32: mtshan nges pa med pa'i tshig 'di dag ni don dam pa'i bden pa la brten par grags so //
T02TD1803E:89b-33: de nas rdo rje slob mas mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-34: bsam gtan rnam pa gnyis rtogs par gyur cing don dam pa'i bden pa'i ming gi rnam grangs thos nas mngon par zhen pa spangs te /
T02TD1803E:89b-35: bzhin rab tu dang ba dang /
T02TD1803E:89b-36: thal mo sbyar ba byas te che du brjod pa'i tshig 'di smras so //
T02TD1803E:89b-37: ae ma'o sangs rgyas ae sangs rgyas //
T02TD1803E:89b-38: chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che //
T02TD1803E:90a-0: @90a * // yang dag don ni dag pa'i don //
T02TD1803E:90a-1: byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1803E:90a-2: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02TD1803E:90a-3: slob dpon gnyis pa ltar bltas nas //
T02TD1803E:90a-4: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
T02TD1803E:90a-5: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
T02TD1803E:90a-6: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa ;
T02TD1803E:90a-7: / chos la bdag med mnyam nyid pas //
T02TD1803E:90a-8: rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa //
T02TD1803E:90a-9: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1803E:90a-10: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas gnyis su med par dmigs te /
T02TD1803E:90a-11: shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:90a-12: rim pa 'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis se gol gyis sgras bskul bar gyur pas mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
T02TD1803E:90a-13: byang chub kyi shing drung la bzhugs nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su 'od gsal ba mngon du mdzad de /
T02TD1803E:90a-14: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas /
T02TD1803E:90a-15: 'gro ba rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:90a-16: deng nas brtsams te dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du bla ma'i kha nas bla ma'i khar brgyud pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:90a-17: rnal 'byor gnyis rnam par dag pa la dga' ba rnams kyi mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa don dam pa'i bden pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u bdun pa'o /
T02TD1803E:90a-19: // rdo rje slob mas gsol ba /
T02TD1803E:90a-20: don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs pa la ni som nyi ma mchis na bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na don dam pa'i bden pa la zhugs te dngos po med par gyur nas ldang bar bgyi /
T02TD1803E:90a-21: 'dir mngon du phyogs pa nyam su myong ba ni gang zhig lags /
T02TD1803E:90a-22: mi ldog par gyur pa ni gang zhig lags /
T02TD1803E:90a-23: thar pa'i don ni gang zhig lags /
T02TD1803E:90a-25: grol ba ni su zhig lags /
T02TD1803E:90a-26: do rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:90a-27: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:90a-28: 'od gsal ba las ldang ba'i rim pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag las kha phyir bltas pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas khyod la khong du chud par bya yis /
T02TD1803E:90b-0: rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis nyon cig / rdo rje theg pa 'di la bskyed pa'i rim @90b pa la bslabs nas sa brgyad pa thob ste /
T02TD1803E:90b-1: yang nas yang du bde 'gror skye zhing ji srid rdzogs pa'i rim pa ma thob pa de srid du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:90b-2: sku dang gsung dang thugs mngon par rtogs nas kyang sa bcu thob pa sgyur ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob cing sgyur ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag par rtogs nas snang ba rnam par dag pa so sor thob ste /
T02TD1803E:90b-3: snang ba med pa las langs nas zung du 'jug par gnas pa'i rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba mngon sum du byas nas /
T02TD1803E:90b-4: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:90b-5: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:90b-6: blo gros chen po snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1803E:90b-7: sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyur ma dang /
T02TD1803E:90b-10: rkyen gyis ma brtsams pas phyi dang nang gi yul rnam par dben pa dang /
T02TD1803E:90b-11: sems phyi rol du lta bas mtshan ma med pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa rnams rim gyis sa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug na /
T02TD1803E:90b-12: khams gsum dag gi sems sgyu mar shin tu mos par rab tu bsgom pa sgyur ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:90b-13: blo gros chen po de lta bas na bdag gi sems snang ba med pa tsam la 'jug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa rjes su thog pa skye ba dang /
T02TD1803E:90b-14: bya ba dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i gzugs lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rjes su song ba de bzhin nyid kyi sprul pa dang ldan pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD1803E:90b-19: thabs kyis brgyan pa sangs rgyas cad kyi zhing gi mu stegs can gyi gnas su nye bar 'gro ba'i sems dang /
T02TD1803E:90b-21: yid kyi ram par shes pa dang bral nas rim gyis gnas 'phos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:91a-0: blo gros chen po de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rjes su 'brang ba rab tu thob pa rnams kyi phung po dang khams dang skye @91a * //
T02TD1803E:91a-5: bya ba dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1803E:91a-8: 'jig pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa dang bral bar sems tsam gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang ji srid du don dam pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa thob pa ma yin pa de srid kyi bar du ni phyir ldog par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1803E:91a-10: ji srid du snang ba gsum rnam par dag par ma gyur pa de srid du ni rnam par shes pa'i kun du rtog pa'o //
T02TD1803E:91a-11: ji srid du kun du rtog pa de srid du ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi rgyun no //
T02TD1803E:91a-12: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi rgyun gyis ni yang srid par 'gyur ba yin la /
T02TD1803E:91a-13: gang sems dpa' gzhan dag dang bral ba de ni rnam par dag pa'i gnas te /
T02TD1803E:91a-14: ji skad du dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las kyang 'di lta ste 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
T02TD1803E:91a-16: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
T02TD1803E:91a-17: 'di lta ste gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:91a-18: rdo rje slob dpon kamba la'i zhal snga nas kyis kyang nang gi bdag nyid sgrub thabs las sgra ji bzhin pa'i rang bzhin sbom por bshad la /
T02TD1803E:91a-19: de bzhin du sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni phra ba ste /
T02TD1803E:91a-20: sems dpa' dang bral ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mchog gi gnas so zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:91a-21: gang rigs pa 'dis mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa 'dis 'od gsal ba yang dag pa thob par gyur pa de'i lus dang ngag dang sems dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid thams cad stong pa nyid yin pas rnam par shes pa gsum rnam par dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni sems pa med cing smra ba med pa gang yin pa 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams te /
T02TD1803E:91a-24: las dang skye ba las rnam par grol ba /
T02TD1803E:91a-28: nor bu'i 'od kyis ngo bo nyid bzhin du gsal ba'o //
T02TD1803E:91b-0: de las ni mun pa'i snang ba ste snang ba nye bar thob @91b pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:91b-1: snang ba nye bar thob pa las gsal ba'i nyi ma'i 'od kyi snang ba'i tsha ba'i ngo bo snang ba mched pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:91b-2: de las ni gsal ba zla ba'i 'od zer bsil ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi snang bas khyab pa shes rab kyi ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:91b-3: dpal mchog dang po las kyang /
T02TD1803E:91b-4: nam mkha' las ni nam mkha' 'byung //
T02TD1803E:91b-5: thams cad stong pa nam mkha' che //
T02TD1803E:91b-7: de bas na stong pa nyid gzhi gcig tu gyur pa'i snang ba'i tshogs nam mkha' snang byed lta bus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te /
T02TD1803E:91b-8: khams phra ba dang lhan cig tu grib ma dang 'dra bar gcad du med pa dang gzhig tu med pa'i rdo rje'i sku'i ngo bo nyid 'pho ba med cing zag pa med pas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad las rnam par grol ba 'dod pa tsam gyis dbang du gyur pa thob pa chu las nya lta bu'am /
T02TD1803E:91b-9: myur bar gnyid log cing sad pa bzhin du mchog tu dga' ba'i lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid can gyi ming ni rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:91b-10: 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las nges par grol bas na thar pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:91b-11: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir dpal gsang ba grub pa las /
T02TD1803E:91b-12: rang gis rig pa'i de kho na //
T02TD1803E:91b-13: gzhan gyis brjod las mi 'byung ste //
T02TD1803E:91b-14: mos dang bsgoms pas rtogs 'gyur gyi //
T02TD1803E:91b-15: dam tshig de ni gzhan du min //
T02TD1803E:91b-16: de nyid de nyid min spangs te //
T02TD1803E:91b-17: mos pa'i bsam pas nyin mtshan du //
T02TD1803E:91b-18: zhi ba'i go 'phang bla na med //
T02TD1803E:91b-19: mchog tu mya ngan 'das pa der //
T02TD1803E:91b-20: de dang de mos pa yi mthus //
T02TD1803E:91b-21: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gang sprul pa //
T02TD1803E:91b-22: der ni skye bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1803E:91b-23: kun dga' las 'byung mchog skyes pa'ang //
T02TD1803E:91b-24: skad cig tsam gyis 'byung ba ste //
T02TD1803E:91b-25: spro dang sdud par byed pa'o //
T02TD1803E:91b-26: khams gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi //
T02TD1803E:91b-28: bsgom pa'i de nyid mthu yis ni //
T02TD1803E:91b-29: thabs shes bdag nyid can zhi ba //
T02TD1803E:91b-30: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing //
T02TD1803E:91b-31: mtshan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan par //
T02TD1803E:91b-32: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba //
T02TD1803E:91b-33: gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid //
T02TD1803E:92a-1: pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing //
T02TD1803E:92a-2: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1803E:92a-3: ye shes sgyu ma 'dra zhing dag /'od gsal rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02TD1803E:92a-4: sgra dang dri dang ro las 'das //
T02TD1803E:92a-5: de bzhin reg pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1803E:92a-6: ting 'dzin ye shes mig can gyi //
T02TD1803E:92a-7: mchog gcig gis ni mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:92a-8: grib ma sgyu ma lta bu'i mchog / mchog gi dbyibs dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1803E:92a-9: ye shes chu rlabs 'phros pa yis //
T02TD1803E:92a-10: rnam pa sna tshogs dpag med gzugs //
T02TD1803E:92a-11: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i lus nyid ni //
T02TD1803E:92a-12: de nyid bsgoms pas thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:92a-13: bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni //
T02TD1803E:92a-14: dam tshig dag ni bsrungs pa yis //
T02TD1803E:92a-15: rgyal bas kyang ni brjod med pa'i //
T02TD1803E:92a-17: gang du ser sna'i gnas gyur pa'i //
T02TD1803E:92a-18: lus ngag yid dang bral ba'i mchog / der ni yang dag bstan dbang gis //
