T02TD1803E:92a-19: rang gi gzugs ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1803E:92a-20: ae ma'o shin tu rmad byed pa //
T02TD1803E:92a-21: ae ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das //
T02TD1803E:92a-22: ae ma'o mchog tu zab pa nyid //
T02TD1803E:92a-23: sangs rgyas nyid kyi gnas mchog yin //
T02TD1803E:92a-25: ldang ba'i rim pa 'di nyid gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:92a-27: ae ma'o rdo rje chos bstan pa //
T02TD1803E:92a-28: gang du lus ngag sems med pa //
T02TD1803E:92a-29: der ni gzugs su rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1803E:92a-31: rje btsun gyi zhal snga nas kyis kyang /
T02TD1803E:92a-32: khong stong khyod kyi sku la med //
T02TD1803E:92a-33: sha dang rus pa khrag kyang med ;
T02TD1803E:92a-34: / nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar //
T02TD1803E:92a-35: khyed kyi sku ni ston par mdzad //
T02TD1803E:92a-36: sku la bsnyun med mi gtsang med //
T02TD1803E:92a-37: bkres dang sgom pa 'byung med kyang //
T02TD1803E:92a-39: 'jig rten bya ba ston par byed //
T02TD1803E:92a-41: rtog pa kun las btus pa las kyang /
T02TD1803E:92a-42: dag pa'i sems ni gzung gyur na //
T02TD1803E:92a-43: rdo rje lus ni rnam bsgoms pas //
T02TD1803E:92a-44: brtan lus khong stong ma yin pa //
T02TD1803E:92a-45: rdo rje'i sku ni des thob 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:92a-47: ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:92a-48: zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bshad de /
T02TD1803E:92b-0: @92b nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'chang //
T02TD1803E:92b-1: shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi mnga' //
T02TD1803E:92b-2: yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab thugs rje can //
T02TD1803E:92b-3: mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog / ces gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-4: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las kyang rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:92b-5: lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur smra'o //
T02TD1803E:92b-6: mya ngan las 'das pa las ches lhag pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod kyang de yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur smra'o zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD1803E:92b-7: de nas de nyid kyi khyad par ni gzugs can ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-8: gzugs med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-9: bden pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-10: brdzun pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-11: dngos po ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-12: dngos po med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-15: rnam pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-16: rnam pa med pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-18: chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-19: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-20: rnam par byang ba ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-22: mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-23: rtag pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-24: mi rtag pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-26: gzhan gyi bdag nyid ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-28: phyi rol ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-29: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-30: 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-31: gnyis pa ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-32: gnyis su med pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o ;
T02TD1803E:92b-33: / zung du 'jug pa'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ming gi rnam grangs 'ga' zhig la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:92b-34: rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-35: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas pa dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-36: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-37: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-38: 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-39: dus gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-40: theg pa gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-41: dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-42: thabs kyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:92b-43: de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-8: skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-11: skyes bu thams cad kyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-12: skyes bu dag pa'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-13: de bzhin du 'khor ba las rgal ba dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-16: 'jigs pa med pa thob pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-17: pha rol tu 'gro bas 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-28: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-30: sems rnam par grol ba dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-31: shes rab rnam par grol ba dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-37: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-38: srid pa sbyor ba yongs su zad pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-39: yang dag pa'i bkas sems rnam par grol ba dang ;
T02TD1803E:93a-40: sems thams cad la dbang thob pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-41: mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-42: 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi mtha' la gnas pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93a-45: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi khyad par bcom ldan 'das kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:93a-46: gang gi dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob pa'i skyes bu dam pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul du mchis pa lags so //
T02TD1803E:93a-47: rang dbang gi ye shes la dbang bgyid pa lags so //
T02TD1803E:93a-48: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes nga mi smra'o //
T02TD1803E:93a-49: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni mngon par shes pa thob pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o //
T02TD1803E:93b-0: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' @93b de la ni sbyang ba byas pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o //
T02TD1803E:93b-1: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni sbyin pa dang /
T02TD1803E:93b-7: thabs dang ldan pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o //
T02TD1803E:93b-8: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni mang du thos pa zhes nga mi smra'o //
T02TD1803E:93b-9: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni spobs pa dang ldan pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o //
T02TD1803E:93b-10: rigs kyi bu dag de bas na nges par 'byung ba'i lam thams cad du nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rlom sems thams cad med pa'i phyir dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1803E:93b-11: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o /
T02TD1803E:93b-13: // / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:93b-14: thos pa dang bsam pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rim pas de kho na nyid rtogs pa yongs su gcod pa bla mas rjes su gnang ba byas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i phun sum tshogs pa la slob par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas rgyu'i gnas skabs su ji ltar gnas par bgyi /
T02TD1803E:93b-16: ji ltar brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa spyad par bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas lung bstan du gsol /
T02TD1803E:93b-17: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:93b-18: sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:93b-19: khyad par gyi rgyu thob cing brtson 'grus 'bar ba rnams dang /
T02TD1803E:93b-20: lus dang srog la ltos pa med pa rnams kyis tshe 'di nyid la rang gi gzugs su 'dzin pa las yongs su log nas /
T02TD1803E:93b-21: yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgyad kyi 'bras bu rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa rnams kyi the tshom med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su 'dri bar byed pa legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:93b-22: dngos por 'dzin pa rnam par bsal nas thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi sgom pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:94a-0: spyod pa rnam par dag pa khyed la rim bzhin du bshad kyis nyon cig /'di la bden pa rnam pa gnyis gnyis su med @94a * //
T02TD1803E:94a-1: pas rgyu dang 'bras bu dag kyang gnyis su med pa yin la /
T02TD1803E:94a-2: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas thob pa dang thob par bya ba dag kyang gnyis su med pa yin la /
T02TD1803E:94a-3: thob ba dang thob par bya ba gnyis su med pas sgom pa dang bsgom par bya ba dag kyang gnyis su med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:94a-4: gnyis su med pa la ni sgrub pa po dang /
T02TD1803E:94a-6: bsgrub par bya ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:94a-7: de dmigs par mi 'gyur bas 'dis gang zhig la ni bsgom par bya ba'am /
T02TD1803E:94a-8: su zhig spyod pa spyad par 'gyur zhes rnam par brtags nas slob par byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:94a-9: yongs su rdzogs pa dag la khyad par med de /
T02TD1803E:94a-10: mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1803E:94a-11: bya ba byas pa'ang de nyid yin //
T02TD1803E:94a-13: 'o na kyang gnas skabs kyi khyad par thob pa na ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag kyang 'jig rten du snang ste /
T02TD1803E:94a-14: gzhan du rgyu med pa'i nyes pa dang bcas par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:94a-15: de bas na slob bzhin pa'i gnas skabs su ni sgom pa po dang sgom pa dang bsgom par bya ba dang /
T02TD1803E:94a-18: bsgrub par bya ba'i spyod pa rnams kyang yod de zhes pa'am /
T02TD1803E:94a-19: med do zhes som nyir mi bya ste /
T02TD1803E:94a-20: 'dir sgrub pa po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:94a-21: sgrub pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02TD1803E:94a-22: bsgrub par bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1803E:94a-23: de bas na rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gnyis su med par bya ba yongs su shes pa ni 'dir sgom pa nyid du bshad do //
T02TD1803E:94a-24: ji skad du thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:94a-25: 'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas btab cing //
T02TD1803E:94a-26: rgyu yang 'bras bus rgyas btab par //
T02TD1803E:94a-27: bsgom gyi gzhan du dngos grub ni //
T02TD1803E:94a-30: spyod pa rnam par dag pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1803E:94a-31: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rtogs par gyur nas mnyam par gzhag pa dang ;
T02TD1803E:94a-32: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs su gnyis su med par 'gyur la /
T02TD1803E:94a-33: de gnyis su med na su zhig spyod pa rnams spyod de /
T02TD1803E:94a-34: ji ltar byed pa po med par gyur pas bya ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten na nges pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:94b-0: yang brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa med par @94b thog ma med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags zad par bya bar ni mi nus so //
T02TD1803E:94b-1: zhes lung las bshad pa dang 'jig rten du grags so //
T02TD1803E:94b-2: ji skad du gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:94b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
T02TD1803E:94b-4: yang dang yang du bskul bar bya //
T02TD1803E:94b-6: ji skad du gsang ba grub pa las kyang /
T02TD1803E:94b-7: rkang brgyad bya ba spangs na ni //
T02TD1803E:94b-8: 'khor ba'i tshogs ni dor nas su //
T02TD1803E:94b-9: rtag tu brtson dang ldan yid kyis //
T02TD1803E:94b-10: rdo rje sems mchog bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1803E:94b-11: 'gyod dang gnyid dang rmugs la sogs //
T02TD1803E:94b-12: rab tu 'bad de sbang bar bya //
T02TD1803E:94b-13: gzhan du bskal pa bye bar ni //
T02TD1803E:94b-16: de bas na mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas thog ma med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi stobs spangs nas /
T02TD1803E:94b-17: lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pas spyod pa spyad na spyod do zhe'am mi spyod do zhes bya ba'i yid la byed pa spangs nas 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad zil gyis mnan te /
T02TD1803E:94b-18: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa la spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:94b-19: de bas na yang dag par gyur pa'i spyod pa de bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi drin gyis ci nus par rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD1803E:94b-20: de la thog mkho nar bcom ldan 'das spyod pa mdzad pa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs su gling la sogs pa la gzigs par mdzad de dga' ldan gyi gnas nas bab par mdzad nas rgyud la sogs pa'i tshul rnam pa bzhir bstan te /
T02TD1803E:94b-21: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas /
T02TD1803E:94b-22: dman pa la mos pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa bzhi rtogs par mdzad cing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa bstan pa dang /
T02TD1803E:94b-23: yang rgya chen po la mngon par zhen pa rnams la rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad la sogs pa chos bdag med pa rtogs par mdzad cing sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ston par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1803E:94b-24: yang 'khor los sgyur pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas /
T02TD1803E:94b-25: zab mo la lhag par mos pa rnams la 'dod chags kyis bden pa gnyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags kyi chos ston par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:95a-0: de bas na bden pa gnyis yongs su gzung ba'i lus @95a * //
T02TD1803E:95a-1: dngos po'i don ma lus pa yongs su gcod par byed cing bde ba chen po'i 'bras bu'i mchog la mngon par dga' ba rnams la nyan thos dang mdo sde'i tshul dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ma gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:95a-2: gang gi phyir nyan thos la sogs pa ni dman pa la lhag par mos shing rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa /
T02TD1803E:95a-3: bdag la bsgrub pa dang bral ba /
T02TD1803E:95a-4: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i bya ba'i lam la zhugs pa /
T02TD1803E:95a-5: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes la dad pa med pa /
T02TD1803E:95a-6: thar ba dang rgyang ring ba zhes bya ba bde ba'i thabs ma rtogs pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la sogs pa spyod pa dga' ba rnams kyis dus ring por byang chub tshol bar byed mod kyi /
T02TD1803E:95a-7: 'on kyang thob par mi byed de /
T02TD1803E:95a-8: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ma rtogs shing khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:95a-9: de bas na 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02TD1803E:95a-10: gang zhig dge slong dngos gnas dang //
T02TD1803E:95a-11: gang yang rtog la dga' ba'i mi //
T02TD1803E:95a-12: gang zhig rgan por gnas gyur pa //
T02TD1803E:95a-13: de la de nyid mi bstan to //
T02TD1803E:95a-15: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1803E:95a-16: thabs dang mi ldan ye shes dang //
T02TD1803E:95a-17: bslab pa dag kyang bshad pa ni //
T02TD1803E:95a-18: dpa' bo chen pos nyan thos rnams //
T02TD1803E:95a-19: de la gzud pa'i phyir bshad do //
T02TD1803E:95a-22: dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam //
T02TD1803E:95a-23: byed pa ye shes spangs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:95a-25: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02TD1803E:95a-26: dge slong nyan thos theg pa la mi bslab //
T02TD1803E:95a-27: byang chub spyod pa de la bslab bya ste //
T02TD1803E:95a-28: byang chub spyod pa sangs rgyas yon tan dang //
T02TD1803E:95a-29: gleng gzhi 'di las rang 'byung dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:95a-31: de bas na khyad par gyi rgyu las khyad par gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:95a-32: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa lnga'i yul rnams la khyad par gyi longs spyod kyi ngo bor gyur pas khyad par gyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:95a-33: gzhan du spyod pa dka' ba rnams kyis sems rtse gcig pa 'thob par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:95a-34: dbang po lnga tshar bcad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:95b-0: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal mchog dang po'i @95b rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:95b-1: dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas //
T02TD1803E:95b-2: lus skam 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal la //
T02TD1803E:95b-3: sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g-yengs pas //
T02TD1803E:95b-4: g-yengs pas dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:95b-7: dka' thub dka' spyad mi bzad pas //
T02TD1803E:95b-9: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
T02TD1803E:95b-12: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:95b-13: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste //
T02TD1803E:95b-16: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams ni nyon mongs pa rab tu skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin pas ngan song gi rgyu yin par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na /
T02TD1803E:95b-17: ji ltar na yang de dag bstan par gyur pas bla na med pa'i go 'phang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba phan tshun 'gal bar mi 'gyur lags sam ;
T02TD1803E:95b-18: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:95b-19: rdo rje slob ma khyod gang 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi the tshom med par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:95b-20: yongs su 'dri bar byed pa legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:95b-21: de bas na don chen po bstan par bya yis nyon cig / nyon mongs pa rnams ni nyan thos la sogs pa dmigs par lta ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rkyen du 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:95b-22: nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:95b-23: ngo bo nyid yongs su shes na ni byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dag las gsungs te /
T02TD1803E:95b-24: ji skad du dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1803E:95b-25: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum //
T02TD1803E:95b-27: dug nyid nye bar zhi gyur na //
T02TD1803E:95b-28: dug ni dug med byas pa yin //
T02TD1803E:95b-29: bdud rtsi rim gyis brten nas ni //
T02TD1803E:95b-30: bdud rtsi nyid du 'gyur ba'ang yin //
T02TD1803E:95b-32: dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:95b-34: dper na grong khyer chen po'i lud gang yin pa de ni bu ram shing gi zhing dag dang /
T02TD1803E:95b-36: rgun 'brum gyi zhing dag la phan par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1803E:96a-0: 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' @96a * //
T02TD1803E:96a-1: nyon mongs pa'i lung gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD1803E:96a-2: 'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na sngags dang sman gyis yongs su zin pa'i dug gis 'chi bar byed mi nus so //
T02TD1803E:96a-3: 'od srungs de bzhin du shes rab dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dug gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:96a-4: gzhan yang 'dul ba don yod par grub pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1803E:96a-5: gang gis blun po 'ching gyur pa //
T02TD1803E:96a-6: de yis mkhas pa yongs grol zhes //
T02TD1803E:96a-7: byang chub rnam par bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1803E:96a-8: 'di dag thams cad phyin ci log / gang gis rmongs pa 'ching 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1803E:96a-10: de nyid kyis ni grol 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1803E:96a-11: shes rab stobs kyis bde ba thob //
T02TD1803E:96a-13: rigs pa 'dis ni khyad par can bskul bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:96a-14: khyad par can gyis yongs su bskul par gyur pas khyad par can gyi 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba skyed pa'i rgyur gyur par zhugs pa'i bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba la sgrub pa gzhan med de /
T02TD1803E:96a-15: de'i don du de nyid kyis bza' ba dang gnas la sogs pa bde ba rnams kyis yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgyad la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i phun sum tshogs pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:96a-17: des na bde ba bde nyid kyis //
T02TD1803E:96a-18: sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:96a-20: de la 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1803E:96a-22: spros pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1803E:96a-24: shin tu spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1803E:96a-25: de la spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa gang zhe na /
T02TD1803E:96a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang /
T02TD1803E:96a-28: rdo rje 'chang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba ji skad du bstan ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi aa ra li rgyas pa de ni spros pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1803E:96a-29: de la spros pa med pa ni gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1803E:96a-30: rtag tu khyab pa las dgos pa'i dbang du 'ga' zhig la rol pa de ni spros pa med pa'o //
T02TD1803E:96b-0: shin tu spros @96b pa med pa gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1803E:96b-1: 'du 'dzi thams cad rnam par spangs nas bsam gtan gyi zas dang /
T02TD1803E:96b-3: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1803E:96b-4: snyoms par 'jug pa las goms pa de ni shin tu spros pa med pa ste /
T02TD1803E:96b-5: dper na shing tshig bar gyur kyang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:96b-6: t'a la'i lo ma tshig par gyur kyang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:96b-7: ras bal gyi lo ma tshig par gyur kyang thal bar 'gyur te thams cad kyang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:96b-8: de bzhin du spyod pa gsum char gyis kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang mngon par 'dod pa nyid skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:96b-9: yang sgrub pa po la ni de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas lag pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1803E:96b-11: stang stabs la sogs pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD1803E:96b-12: gar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rtag tu brtson pa'i yid dang /
T02TD1803E:96b-13: nyin dang mtshan du spros pa dang bcas pa'i mchod pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub par byed do //
T02TD1803E:96b-14: de bzhin du la la ni dpal mchog dang po la sogs pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la brten nas skyil mo krung gi 'dug stangs dang /
T02TD1803E:96b-15: nyams rnam pa dgu la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol mo spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed do //
T02TD1803E:96b-16: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di las ni spros pa med pa dang shin tu spros pa med pa'i gnas 'ba' zhig ston to //
T02TD1803E:96b-17: da ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:96b-18: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1803E:96b-19: rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1803E:96b-20: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1803E:96b-21: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02TD1803E:96b-22: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1803E:96b-23: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02TD1803E:96b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i bde 'byung ba //
T02TD1803E:96b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog / rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras //
T02TD1803E:96b-26: dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i //
T02TD1803E:96b-27: bla re dam pa bres pa na //
T02TD1803E:96b-28: rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs //
T02TD1803E:96b-29: glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul //
T02TD1803E:96b-30: me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1803E:97a-0: mar me dri dang sogs ldan @97a * //
T02TD1803E:97a-2: / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1803E:97a-3: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub //
T02TD1803E:97a-4: yang na srid pa gsum dag gam //
T02TD1803E:97a-5: yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam //
T02TD1803E:97a-6: skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub //
T02TD1803E:97a-7: der ni dang por gdan bsham ste //
T02TD1803E:97a-9: sna tshogs padmo ras kyis g-yogs //
T02TD1803E:97a-10: der ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan //
T02TD1803E:97a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1803E:97a-12: sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul bas //
T02TD1803E:97a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha //
T02TD1803E:97a-14: de ni rnam par 'phrul par mdzad //
T02TD1803E:97a-15: khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang //
T02TD1803E:97a-16: de bzhin srog dang rtsol las byung //
T02TD1803E:97a-17: rang gi lha la mngon phyogs pa'i //
T02TD1803E:97a-18: grub pa'i phyag rgyas rab tu bskor //
T02TD1803E:97a-19: lugs ma'am yang na 'bur dang ni //
T02TD1803E:97a-20: mngon par 'dus byas legs bris pa //
T02TD1803E:97a-21: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs brnyan ni //
T02TD1803E:97a-22: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag / stan de dag ni thams cad la //
T02TD1803E:97a-23: ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod //
T02TD1803E:97a-24: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1803E:97a-25: rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas //
T02TD1803E:97a-26: rdo rje rin chen padma sogs //
T02TD1803E:97a-27: sgo srung dang ni ldan par bya //
T02TD1803E:97a-28: rang gi lha dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD1803E:97a-29: bud med dag ni legs bslabs pa //
T02TD1803E:97a-30: skal bzang rang bzhin phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02TD1803E:97a-31: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
T02TD1803E:97a-33: mdo'i tshig de rnams kyi don rgya cher dgrol bar bya ste /
T02TD1803E:97a-34: de la dang po kho nas skyed mos tshal la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa rnam par dben pa'i gnas su tshul dang mi mthun pa la sogs pa skal ba ngan pa rnams dang bral ba'i gnas dag tu so phag las byas pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par byed du gzhug go //
T02TD1803E:97a-35: de la khang pa dang por ni tshang mang gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:97a-36: khang pa gnyis par ni pi wang la sogs pa glu gar dang rol mo'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:97a-37: khang pa gsum par ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig tu dpal sna tshogs skal ba bzang po'i mchog gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:97a-38: yang na sa'i khang par rab tu brtan pa la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02TD1803E:97b-0: rdo rje'i @97b rang bzhin gyi sa'i cha la shel dang /
T02TD1803E:97b-4: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin can ri'i rgyal po ri rab la rdo rje rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas khang du rnam par bsams te /
T02TD1803E:97b-5: gru bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa //
T02TD1803E:97b-6: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas //
T02TD1803E:97b-7: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD1803E:97b-8: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas pa //
T02TD1803E:97b-9: dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras //
T02TD1803E:97b-10: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD1803E:97b-11: dril bu ba dan legs par mdzes //
T02TD1803E:97b-12: rnga yab la sogs rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD1803E:97b-13: sgo yi mtshams ni thams cad dang //
T02TD1803E:97b-14: mtshams su zla phyed rdo rje ldan //
T02TD1803E:97b-15: skas dang rta babs sgo la sogs //
T02TD1803E:97b-16: sna tshogs padmas mdzes byas pa //
T02TD1803E:97b-18: der sgrub po bla ma las gnang ba thob pas rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams legs par mchod pa lhan cig spyod ba dang /
T02TD1803E:97b-19: rjes su spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu tha mal pa'i nga rgyal bsal ba rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dzem pa med par gyur pa'i sems kyis sems seng ge 'dra bas rim pa 'dis phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:97b-20: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:97b-21: don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bdag nyid bskyed la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i tshul gyis 'dug nas gzugs kyi yul la spyod par byed do //
T02TD1803E:97b-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bud med kyi sgyu ma lta bur rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir la la ni bde mchog sgyu ma lta bus 'dod chags kyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02TD1803E:97b-23: la la ni ae ma'o bde ba lta bus rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyis g-yas phyogs su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:97b-24: la la ni sgron ma lta bus drag po'i rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyis nub phyogs su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:97b-25: la la ni sha shi lta bus srog gi rgyud kyi ngo ngo nyid kyis byang phyogs su gnas te 'di dag ni lhan cig spyod pa'o //
T02TD1803E:97b-26: la la ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lta bus gti mug rnam par spyod pa'i phyir shar lho'i mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-0: la la ni chos kyi 'khor lo lta bus khams gsum rgal cing gnon pa'i gnas rnam @98a * //
T02TD1803E:98a-1: par sbyong bas lho nub mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-2: la la ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ma lta bus zhe sdang rnam par bsal ba'i phyir nub byang mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-3: la la ni 'dod pa'i lcug ma lta bus 'dod chags kyi mun pa bsal ba'i phyir byang shar gyi mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-4: la la ni gling bu ma lta bus phyi rol gyi me'i phyogs su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-5: la la ni rgyud mangs lta bus sgeg cing pi wang len pas khams gsum dbang du byed cing phyi rol gyi bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-6: la la ni rgyud gcig pa lta bus rnga bo che rdung zhing dug dang rims rnam par sel bas phyi rol gyi rlung gi phyogs su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-7: la la ni rgyud stug po lta bus rdza rnga rdung zhing phyi rol gyi dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-8: la la ni rdo rje me tog ma lta bus lag na me tog thogs te phyi rol gyi shar lho'i mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-9: la la ni rdo rje bdug pa ma lta bus spos khang thogs nas lho nub kyi mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-10: la la ni rdo rje mar me ma lta bus mar me chen po thogs nas nub byang gi mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-11: la la ni rdo rje byug pa ma lta bus dris yongs su gang ba'i dung phor thogs nas phyi rol gyi snam bu'i byang shar mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-12: la la ni rta gdong lta bus rta mchog gi kha nas 'byung ba'i dbugs kyis srid pa gsum skems shing shar phyogs kyi sgo srung byed par gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-13: la la ni rdo rje phag gdong lta bus khams gsum thams cad sdud cing lho phyogs kyi sgo srung byed par gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-14: la la ni rdo rje snang ba'i gzugs kyis khams gsum la lta zhing nub phyogs kyi sgo srung byed par gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-15: la la ni thal ba rab tu 'jigs pa'i ro langs ma lta bus sa 'og dang sa steng dang mtho ris su dbugs 'byin cing thal bar gyur pa yang 'tsho bar byed de byang phyogs kyi sgo srung byed pas gnas so //
T02TD1803E:98a-16: de la bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po 'khor los sgyur ba ni sngon byung ba'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin la dgongs pa sngon du 'gro bas rang gi sku'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par bya'o zhes khyad par gyi nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02TD1803E:98b-0: dang po gzugs la @98b sogs pa yul rnam pa gsum nyams su myong nas de'i rjes su sbyong ba la sogs pa cho ga rnam pa gsum gyis zas thams cad mngon par sbyangs la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i nang gi thab khung rjes su dran te /
T02TD1803E:98b-1: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i zhal du rtse gsum pa'i me'i nang du sbyin sreg dbul lo zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bskyed nas zas la spyad par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:98b-2: de'i 'og tu bde bar yongs su zhu nas ras ya nar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:98b-3: de ltar sgrub pa pos bza' ba dang /
T02TD1803E:98b-5: btung ba rnams kyis sku rdo rje yang dag par tshim par byas la /
T02TD1803E:98b-6: mthar rim pa 'dis lnga ba reg bya'i yul la spyod par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:98b-7: lhan cig spyod pa la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs rjes su mnyes par byed pa la sogs pa mkhas pa la brten nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i phyag rgya blangs nas nye bar bzhag ste /
T02TD1803E:98b-8: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rdzogs par bya'o zhes lhag par mos pa brtan pa bskyed nas ;
T02TD1803E:98b-12: na ga pra ha ra na dang /
T02TD1803E:98b-16: n'a li yang dag bar bskul ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD1803E:98b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02TD1803E:98b-18: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02TD1803E:98b-19: rin po che'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02TD1803E:98b-21: las kyi skyil mo krung la sogs pa bcas nas las la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:98b-22: de nas rdo rje dang padma yang dag par 'dus pa las thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pas phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi bo nas brtsams te /
T02TD1803E:98b-23: n'a li bdun cu rtsa gnyis las dri ma med pa'i chu rgyun lta bus a'a li k'a li 'ju bar gyur pas 'dod chags dang /
T02TD1803E:98b-25: chags pa bar ma'i rim gyis 'bab po //
T02TD1803E:98b-26: de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid so so rang gis rig pa rdzogs par byed do //
T02TD1803E:98b-27: de ltar dpal bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la slob pa'i mchog thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du rjes su gzung ba dang /
T02TD1803E:98b-28: tshar gcod pas sems can rnams smin par byed do //
T02TD1803E:99a-0: gdul bya stong pa nyid kyi lta ba can la la dag la bcom ldan @99a * //
T02TD1803E:99a-1: 'das dpal bad ba chen po de nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1803E:99a-2: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
T02TD1803E:99a-3: zhes bya ba mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can rab tu bstan nas stong pa nyid kyi lta ba can tshar gcod par mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:99a-4: de bzhin du shin tu gdug cing gdul bar dka' ba rnams la dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lta ba ngan pa tshar bcad nas phan 'dogs par mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:99a-5: log par lta ba rnams ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis don dam pa'i bden pa bstan nas dbang du mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:99a-6: shin tu dman zhing ser sna can brkam pa rnams la dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs dang /
T02TD1803E:99a-7: rgyas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs pa'i lta ba tshar gcod par mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:99a-8: brtson 'grus shin tu dman pa rnams la ni rta mchog gi gzugs dang /
T02TD1803E:99a-9: drag po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis pha rol gnon pas brtson 'grus zhan pa rnams tshar gcod par mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:99a-10: de la bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po ni chos 'byung ba'i aa ra li chen po'i rol pa'i ngo bo nyid rab tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir thugs gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:99a-11: phan tshun rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir rim pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi rol mo mdzad de /
T02TD1803E:99a-23: ngag gi brda tha snyad rnams su byed pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:99a-24: de la ngag gi brda bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:99a-25: aom aa ti ho zhes pa ni brda'i phyag 'tshal lo zhes ston pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:99a-26: aom pra ti ka zhes pa ni slar phyag lan to //
T02TD1803E:99a-27: tstshe tstshem zhes bya ba ni slob dpon la phyag bya ba'o //
T02TD1803E:99a-29: tstshom nam legs par 'ongs sam zhes pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99a-32: kha ni rab tu zo shig pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99a-35: drem drem ni sha zo shig pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99a-36: dzam pham ni rdo rje'i chu'o //
T02TD1803E:99a-37: so ma ni bdud rtsi'i chu'o //
T02TD1803E:99a-38: ai da ya ni chang ngo //
T02TD1803E:99b-0: sham pa ri ni btung @99b ba'o ;
T02TD1803E:99b-2: su pri yam ni me tog ga //
T02TD1803E:99b-4: dza la kam ni gos so //
T02TD1803E:99b-6: ksho rnams ni rang gi khyim mo //
T02TD1803E:99b-7: ka ma dam ni lha'i khang pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-8: kshe pa na ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1803E:99b-9: bho da na ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon no //
T02TD1803E:99b-11: / mi tra ta ram ni spun no //
T02TD1803E:99b-13: ko bi ta ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-19: ba hu la ni gzugs bzang ma'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-20: lo ta ta ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-21: ba ha ri ni zo shig pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-22: dha nu da ni rdzas byin cig pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-23: she she ni song shig pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-24: pre pre ni shog shig pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-26: bi tru mo ni khros pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-29: n'i ra ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-32: rim pa bzhin du mchod pa ni su ra ta stvam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-33: rang gi lha rjes su dran pa la su ra to ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-34: aa nu ta r'a ga y'a mi zhes bya ba ni lan te rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa la'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-35: dpal rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa la ni aa nu po da y'a mi zhes bya ba lan yin no //
T02TD1803E:99b-36: dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje sgrub pa ni aa nu mo da y'a mi zhes bya ba lan yin no //
T02TD1803E:99b-37: dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa la ni yang aa nu r'a ga y'a mi zhes bya ba lan yin no //
T02TD1803E:99b-38: rta mchog gi sgrub pa la ni aa nu barsha y'a mi zhes bya ba lan yin no //
T02TD1803E:99b-39: lha mo gang yin pa rnams kyi mchod pa'i lan yin te ;
T02TD1803E:99b-40: sa ma ya satvam zhes bya ba'i tshig lngas so //
T02TD1803E:99b-41: rang gi lha rjes su dran par bya ba la ni sa ma yo ham zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor te tshogs kyi mchod pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-42: ngag gi brda'i le'u'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-43: da ni lus kyi brda bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:99b-44: spyi bor nyug pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-45: dpral bar reg pa ni phyag gi lan no //
T02TD1803E:99b-46: g-yas pa'i smin ma bskyod pa ni sku'i dngos grub po //
T02TD1803E:99b-47: g-yon pas ni rnam par rgyal pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-48: mig g-yon pa la reg pa ni bud med bzang mo yin zhes pa'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-49: g-yas pas ni skyes pa bzang po'o //
T02TD1803E:99b-50: rna ba g-yon pa la reg pa ni legs par 'ongs pa'o //
T02TD1803E:100a-0: @100a * // g-yas pas ni legs par smras pa'o //
T02TD1803E:100a-1: sna khung g-yas pa la reg pa ni sbos so //
T02TD1803E:100a-2: g-yon pa la ni dri slong ba'o //
T02TD1803E:100a-3: lce g-yas su sgul ba ni sha'o //
T02TD1803E:100a-4: g-yon du ni chang slong ba'o //
T02TD1803E:100a-5: mchan khung g-yon par reg pa ni zas so //
T02TD1803E:100a-6: g-yas par reg pa ni tshod mo slong ba'o //
T02TD1803E:100a-7: lus kyi brda'i le'u'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1803E:100a-8: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan rnam par bsal zhing yid la re ba rnams spangs nas rtag tu dga' ba'i yid can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' bzhin pas ni ji ltar rgyal po aindra bh'u ti dang 'dra bar phung po'i khog pa brjes te /
T02TD1803E:100a-9: rdo rje'i lus su gyur nas btsun mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu mi snang bar gyur te /
T02TD1803E:100a-10: yon tan brgyad dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste ji skad du rtsa ba'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:100a-11: lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la //
T02TD1803E:100a-12: ci bde bar ni brten bya ba //
T02TD1803E:100a-13: bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas //
T02TD1803E:100a-14: bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod //
T02TD1803E:100a-15: rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi //
T02TD1803E:100a-16: rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing //
T02TD1803E:100a-17: rtag tu myong bar byed pa na //
T02TD1803E:100a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD1803E:100a-20: ra sa ya na'i bde ba des //
T02TD1803E:100a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang //
T02TD1803E:100a-22: lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub //
T02TD1803E:100a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang //
T02TD1803E:100a-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan dang //
T02TD1803E:100a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po //
T02TD1803E:100a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che //
T02TD1803E:100a-27: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po //
T02TD1803E:100a-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso //
T02TD1803E:100a-29: rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / de dag dang ni dga' spyod na //
T02TD1803E:100a-31: lha mo thams cad grub chen po //
T02TD1803E:100a-34: yang na 'byor ba chung ba rnams kyis bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas rol mo'i spros pa rgya che ba dang /
T02TD1803E:100a-35: rtag tu phun sum tshogs par mi nus pa des ni spros pa med pa dang shin tu spros pa med pa 'di nyid bde mchog tu bstan pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:100a-36: nyin re'am yang na zla re'am //
T02TD1803E:100a-37: yang na de bzhin lo rer ni //
T02TD1803E:100b-0: ji bzhin byin gyis @100b brlabs nas kyang //
T02TD1803E:100b-1: sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o //
T02TD1803E:100b-4: 'chag gam ji ltar gnas pa dang //
T02TD1803E:100b-5: dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung //
T02TD1803E:100b-6: gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung //
T02TD1803E:100b-8: dbang po gang dang gang la ma gyur //
T02TD1803E:100b-9: de dang de yi ngo bor bya //
T02TD1803E:100b-10: mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1803E:100b-11: thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin bya //
T02TD1803E:100b-13: 'dod chags chos kyi tshul bstan pa'i //
T02TD1803E:100b-14: rnam par rol pa spros pa ni //
T02TD1803E:100b-15: nam mkha' mnyam pas mkha' lta bu //
T02TD1803E:100b-16: mtha' med rgya mtsho dag dang mtshungs //
T02TD1803E:100b-17: slob mas khong du chud pa'i phyir //
T02TD1803E:100b-18: dngos po tsam zhig blangs pa yin //
T02TD1803E:100b-19: 'dod chags bstan par bya ba ni //
T02TD1803E:100b-20: skye ba du mas bshad nus sam //
T02TD1803E:100b-21: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi tshul las /
T02TD1803E:100b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa chos 'byung ba'i mngon par byang chub pa'i spros pa dang bcas ba bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o /
T02TD1803E:100b-24: // / rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:100b-25: spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa ni yongs su gsal bar gyur lags na /
T02TD1803E:100b-26: spros pa med ba'i spyod pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1803E:100b-27: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1803E:100b-28: sems can chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1803E:100b-29: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi man ngag gis rab tu bstan par bya yis /
T02TD1803E:100b-30: rtse gcig ba'i yid kyis nyon cig / ri bo shin tu dben pa dang //
T02TD1803E:100b-31: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs na //
T02TD1803E:100b-32: 'bras bu me tog rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD1803E:100b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud las gsungs pa'i yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su sa'i khang pa ji skad du bshad pa bzhin mngon par sbyangs la der zur bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed la /
T02TD1803E:101a-0: de'i 'og tu tha mal ba'i nga rgyal dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor pa chen pos phyi rol gyi phyag rgya mngon par sbyangs la rigs gcig tu gtogs pa'i @101a * //
T02TD1803E:101a-1: rang gi slob ma dang lhan cig tu 'og nas bshad pa'i rim gyis phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:101a-2: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:101a-3: dang po kho nar don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis mi bskyod pa phyung ste rjes su bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid du gnas la /
T02TD1803E:101a-4: de nas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal bsal te /
T02TD1803E:101a-5: mi phyed pa'i 'khor rnams rang gi sku'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams su lhag par mos pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha ma lus pa rjes su mnyes par byas la rang gi phyag rgya dang lhan cig ril por 'dzin pa'am /
T02TD1803E:101a-6: gzhig pa'i rim gyis don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug go //
T02TD1803E:101a-7: de nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i don gyi rdo rje sems khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis yang dag par bskul pas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis skad cig gis langs nas mchog tu dga' ba'i ro myang bar bya ba'i phyir nyams rnam pa dgus rol pa mdzad do //
T02TD1803E:101a-8: de ltar yang nas yang du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu zhugs nas yang nas yang du bzhengs te /
T02TD1803E:101a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams myong bar mdzad de /
T02TD1803E:101a-10: ji ltar yid zhum par mi 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi aa ra li rdzogs par byed de /
T02TD1803E:101a-11: de la rang gi gzugs la sogs pa gzugs kyi yul rnam pa gsum la rjes su spyod pa byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:101a-12: glu dang pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra'i yul rnam pa gsum la rjes su spyod par byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:101a-13: spos dang me tog la sogs pa dri rnam pa gsum la rjes su spyod par byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:101a-18: lan tshva la sogs pa'i ro rnam pa gsum la rjes su spyod par byed do //
T02TD1803E:101a-19: de nas lo bcu drug ma skye gnas ma nyams shing nu ma ma khrang zhing rgyas pa'i na chung ji lta bu'i sme sha can dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-2: gzhan gang yang rung yan lag mi dman pa'am /
T02TD1803E:101b-3: rtsa lag tu gyur pa'i bud med dang gzhan la'ang des bgrod par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:101b-4: de nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:101b-5: 'jig rten pas smad pa'i dam tshig rnams gang yin pa la spyad pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis mngon bar 'dus byas la 'jig rten pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa spangs te rab tu gsang ba'i gnas na 'dug ste longs spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:101b-6: de bzhin du phyag rgya mi bcing ba dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-9: mchod rten gyi las mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-10: glegs bam mi klag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-11: lus kyi ngal du ba spang ba dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-12: ras ris dang shing dang rdo'i gzugs brnyan la phyag mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-13: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mi 'gro ba dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-14: tshes grangs dang byed pa dang thang cig dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-15: skad cig ma'i dus la ltos par mi byed de /
T02TD1803E:101b-16: 'di dag thams cad ni nang gi bdag nyid kho nas rdzogs par byed do //
T02TD1803E:101b-17: gal te 'byor pa ma tshang bas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya bar mi nus par gyur na sgrub pa bo des de kho na nyid rnam pa lngas kyang spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la rim pa 'dis bslab par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:101b-18: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:101b-19: la la ni gzugs rdo rje ma lta bus lag pa'i padma 'jam pa dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-20: me long thogs nas zhi ba'i mig gis lta zhing mu tig gi chun 'phyang ma lus par 'khrol zhing rnam par phye ba dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-21: nu ma rgyas shing cung zad mnyen pa dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-22: gos grol zhing ro smad cung zad ston pas bde pa chen pos rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir shar lho'i mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:101b-23: la la ni sgra rdo rje ma lta bus mig rnam par 'byed cing lta ba dang /
T02TD1803E:101b-24: sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pas rol cing 'gying bag dang bcas pas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos ston pa 'chad pa la mkhas shing dge ba'i gtam smra zhing rab tu glu len la ko ki la'i glu'i rjes su pi wang gi rol mo rab tu rdung bas lho nub kyi mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:102a-1: dri rdo rje ma lta bus 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis lta bar byed cing sor mo mthon po bimba lta bu'i 'od kyis rnam par mdzes pa zangs ltar dmar zhing dra bas 'brel ba'i lag pa'i rtse mos gar byed pa lta bus nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi snod 'dzin cing gur kum dang ;
T02TD1803E:102a-4: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-5: ga pur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyis bsgos pas phyogs bcu ma lus pa dris khyab par byed pa'i dri'i snod thogs te nub byang gi mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:102a-6: la la ni ro rdo rje ma lta bus brtse ba dang bcas pa'i mig gis lta bar byed cing gser dang dngul la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-7: rin po che dpag tu med pa'i snod thogs te /
T02TD1803E:102a-8: tshod rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i ro'i mchog rnams dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-9: lha'i kha zas bdud rtsi chen po dang bcas pa mthun pa'i kha zas thogs nas byang shar mtshams su gnas so //
T02TD1803E:102a-10: la la ni reg rdo rje ma lta bus lus mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro gnyer gsum gyis mngon par mdzes pa /
T02TD1803E:102a-11: dbus shin tu phra ba rgyal mtshan ltar lte ba rgya che zhing g-yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing zab pa sku smad lci ba 'gros dal zhing shin tu sgeg pa bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas shing zhi bas lta ba bde ba chen po rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir phang par nye bar bzhag nas gnas so //
T02TD1803E:102a-12: de nas bde ba chen po'i dpal rab tu dga' ba'i spyod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:102a-16: ku tsa kra ha na dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-17: pu la ka t'a da na dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-18: da sha na kha da na dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-22: kur pa ral sogs pa'i ka ran dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-23: rab tu rmongs pas mu tig gi chun 'phyang bskyed cing du bu dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-25: rkang gdub kyi sgra dang ldan par yul dang /
T02TD1803E:102a-32: shes bya la snyoms par zhugs shing a'a li k'a li dang /
T02TD1803E:102b-0: n'a di gsum tyam ku las rab tu bskul bas phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @102b dri ma med pa'i rgyun lta bus zhu bar gyur nas ye shes kyi sa thob nas mchog tu bde ba chen po'i gnas yang dag par rig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:102b-1: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:102b-3: chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1803E:102b-4: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten //
T02TD1803E:102b-6: gal te gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa dag kyang med na de'i tshe reg bya rdo rje gcig pu dang lhan cig pa'i kun du sbyor bas kyang bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:102b-7: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sgrub pa po'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'dus pa yin la lha mo thams cad ni reg bya rdo rje'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'dus pa yin te /
T02TD1803E:102b-8: de bas na mi phyed pa'i nga rgyal gyis rnam par mi rtog par bslab bar bya'o zhes rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1803E:102b-10: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
T02TD1803E:102b-11: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams //
T02TD1803E:102b-12: lus dang ngag sems bsgoms pas ni //
T02TD1803E:102b-13: rang gi ngo bor de byas na //
T02TD1803E:102b-14: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:102b-15: de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so //
T02TD1803E:102b-16: thor tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs //
T02TD1803E:102b-17: chen po kha dog dkar bo 'dra //
T02TD1803E:102b-18: sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams //
T02TD1803E:102b-19: cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya //
T02TD1803E:102b-20: lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni //
T02TD1803E:102b-21: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02TD1803E:102b-22: bzhin sdug mig ni dkyus ring pa //
T02TD1803E:102b-23: rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad //
T02TD1803E:102b-24: spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod pas //
T02TD1803E:102b-25: rdo rje mtshan mas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1803E:102b-26: phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes //
T02TD1803E:102b-27: sngags dang rgyud ni legs par bslabs //
T02TD1803E:102b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya //
T02TD1803E:102b-29: sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas pa //
T02TD1803E:102b-30: brtul zhugs chen po dus bzhir ni //
T02TD1803E:102b-31: gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1803E:102b-32: sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi //
T02TD1803E:102b-33: bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya //
T02TD1803E:102b-35: bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che //
T02TD1803E:103a-0: zla ba drug gis de dag @103a * //
T02TD1803E:103a-3: sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas //
T02TD1803E:103a-4: nags tshal rtag tu bsod snyoms bslang //
T02TD1803E:103a-5: kha zas bzang po bstar ba dag / skrag nas de dag ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:103a-6: 'das na rdo rje gsum bdag nyid //
T02TD1803E:103a-8: lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo //
T02TD1803E:103a-9: lha ma yin nam mi mo'ang rung //
T02TD1803E:103a-10: rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad //
T02TD1803E:103a-11: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsten //
T02TD1803E:103a-13: de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa drug ste /
T02TD1803E:103a-17: dgod pa'i 'khrig pas mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba skad cig skad cig la nyams su myong bar byed do //
T02TD1803E:103a-18: rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang 'khor ba dag las rtag tu dga' ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:103a-19: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir lha thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i rgyud las ;
T02TD1803E:103a-20: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te //
T02TD1803E:103a-21: rtsol ba'i cho ga'i 'og tu ni //
T02TD1803E:103a-22: dga' ba'i sems kyis thugs 'grub pa //
T02TD1803E:103a-23: bde ba chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103a-24: spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o /
T02TD1803E:103a-26: // / da ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la 'jug bar bya ste /
T02TD1803E:103a-27: ri bo shin tu dpen pa'am //
T02TD1803E:103a-28: chu ngogs 'bab chu'i gnas rnams dang //
T02TD1803E:103a-29: dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su //
T02TD1803E:103a-31: zhes rgyud las gsungs pa'i yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su kha zas sbyor ba'i phyir gnod sbyin mo mngag gzhug mo la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103a-32: yang na sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gam //
T02TD1803E:103a-33: tshogs chen po'i kha zas tsam bsgrubs nas rim pa 'dis shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103a-34: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:103a-35: de la dang po kho nar sgrub pa pos 'khor ba thog ma med pa can gyi sdug bsngal dran par byas la /
T02TD1803E:103a-36: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pas 'du 'dzi thams cad yongs su spang bar bya zhing tha na rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la'ang sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103a-37: gnyis pa til 'phur la'ang dngos por 'dzin pa'i blo spang par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103b-0: gsum pa don @103b dam pa'i bden pa la dad pas lus dang srog la'ang ltos pa med par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103b-1: ji skad du ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo las /
T02TD1803E:103b-2: rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la ltos pa med par bya'o zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD1803E:103b-3: de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub phra mo dang /
T02TD1803E:103b-4: grub pa chen po brgyad la don du gnyer bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1803E:103b-5: rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1803E:103b-6: phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:103b-7: ji skad du thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:103b-8: de nas gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i phyir dngos grub gang ci yang rung ba la tshol bar mi byed de /
T02TD1803E:103b-9: 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i ngag gi dngos grub dang /
T02TD1803E:103b-10: mngag gzhug pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1803E:103b-11: bum pa bzang po'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1803E:103b-13: rgyal srid kyi dngos grub dang /
T02TD1803E:103b-15: dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1803E:103b-16: mngon spyod kyi dngos grub rnams don du gnyer bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1803E:103b-18: 'di ltar dngos grub chen po'i don du dngos grub phra mo la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103b-19: rnam par mi rtog pa'i dngos grub 'ba' zhig la sems rtse gcig par gyur par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103b-20: de skad du gsang ba grub pa las kyang /
T02TD1803E:103b-21: sbyor ba la sogs 'bad pa ni //
T02TD1803E:103b-22: de nyid rig pas spang bar bya //
T02TD1803E:103b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' nges 'jug pa //
T02TD1803E:103b-24: spangs nas gzhan du mi bya'o //
T02TD1803E:103b-25: dag pa'i de nyid la gnas pas //
T02TD1803E:103b-26: sbyong ba rnams kyang mi bya ste //
T02TD1803E:103b-27: bdag nyid gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1803E:103b-28: ji srid bar du so sor brtag / dngos med go 'phang la gnas dang //
T02TD1803E:103b-29: thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1803E:103b-30: rtog las gang ci 'ang 'byung ba rnams //
T02TD1803E:103b-32: bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni //
T02TD1803E:103b-33: dngos grub mtshan nyid gang ci'ang rung //
T02TD1803E:103b-34: de kun skad cig tsam la ni //
T02TD1803E:103b-35: rang nyid gnas par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1803E:104a-0: de bas na phyi rol gyi bud med rnam par spangs nas snying gar gnas pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig @104a * //
T02TD1803E:104a-1: snyoms par 'jug pas shin tu myur bar rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang rdzogs par bya'o zhes spros bas dmigs te /
T02TD1803E:104a-2: gcig pu kho nar 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:104a-3: de yi rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:104a-4: ji srid phung po'i zam tog yod pa de srid kyi bar du ni rnam par shes pa gsum gyi ngo bo ste /
T02TD1803E:104a-5: rang bzhin gyis snang ba 'gro ba dag dang gzhan la snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:104a-8: gnyis pa ni rang bzhin no //
T02TD1803E:104a-9: de rlung dang bcas pas gang phyogs bcur 'khor ba ste /
T02TD1803E:104a-12: 'dod chags bar ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:104a-19: tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang bzhin brgya drug cu nyin mtshan du yid la byas nas ma rig ba rang 'gags shing yang langs nas rlung gi dbang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1803E:104a-20: des lus dkrugs nas ji srid du mig la sogs pa'i dbang po yul la dmigs pa de srid du de nyid du dmigs par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:104a-21: thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:104a-22: de nas skye ba gcig nas gcig tu goms pas bdag med pa'i chos la bslabs pas rnam par bsres pa'i sbyor ba khong du chud nas rang bzhin gyis snang ba dang gcig tu 'dre bar bya ste /
T02TD1803E:104a-23: rim pa 'dis don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs par bya'o //
T02TD1803E:104a-24: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:104a-25: phung po la sogs pa ni khams phra ba la gzhug go //
T02TD1803E:104a-26: khams phra ba ni yang sems la gzhug go //
T02TD1803E:104a-27: sems ni yang ma rig pa la gzhug ste /
T02TD1803E:104a-28: de ltar sbyar nas gnyid log par byed do //
T02TD1803E:104a-29: de la dus 'dir ni sems dang sems pa ma rig pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i skad cig la dran pa brjod pa'o //
T02TD1803E:104a-30: phyis ni brjod pa yang med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1803E:104a-31: yang grol ba na rlung gi rang bzhin rnyed de /
T02TD1803E:104a-32: gang gi tshe rmi lam gzhan dag 'byung ba ni ji srid du rnam par shes pa mi g-yo ba de srid du gnyis log nas 'od gal ba la blta ste /
T02TD1803E:104b-0: de ni so sor rang gis rig pa lus dang ngag dang sems dang bral ba'i don dam pa'i bden pa nang gi mngon par byang chub @104b pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1803E:104b-1: rim pa 'dis lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams gsad par bya zhing de bzhin nyid la gzhug par byas nas skal ba bzang po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:104b-2: spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la ltos pa med pas shin tu myur bar 'dir rang gi gzugs yongs su brjed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02TD1803E:104b-3: don 'di nyid dgongs ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:104b-4: gzugs sogs nang gi chos rnams ni //
T02TD1803E:104b-5: mthong ba lhag mthong zhes brjod la //
T02TD1803E:104b-6: mi bskyod la sogs grangs bzhin du //
T02TD1803E:104b-7: brtags pa dag ni zhi gnas yin //
T02TD1803E:104b-8: 'di dag dngos med gyur pa yi //
T02TD1803E:104b-9: de bzhin nyid ni zhi bar bshad //
T02TD1803E:104b-10: de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1803E:104b-11: rnal 'byor ba yis sangs rgyas gzhug / ces gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1803E:104b-12: yang lha thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1803E:104b-13: mya ngan 'das pa'i mi bzad mes //
T02TD1803E:104b-14: thal ba'ang lus par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1803E:104b-15: des na der ni dbang don dang //
T02TD1803E:104b-16: khams rnams 'dir ni yod pa ma yin //
T02TD1803E:104b-18: rim pa 'dis ni lung dang rigs pa dag gis mngon par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum nges par byas nas /
T02TD1803E:104b-19: yul la zhen pa dang rol pa thams cad spangs te /
T02TD1803E:104b-20: rim pa 'dis bhu su ku tsam gyi spyod pa la spyad de /
T02TD1803E:104b-22: bhu zhes bya ba ni zas la spyod pa ste de tsam zhig rjes su dran pa dang 'du 'dzi spong bar byed cing dka' thub dang brtul zhugs so zhes gang la'ang bsam par mi bya'o //
T02TD1803E:104b-23: su zhes bya ba ni gnyid log pa ste rnam par shes pa 'di dag ma rig pas nye bar mtshon pas mngon sum du byed do //
T02TD1803E:104b-24: ma rig pa lcags kyu lta bu de nyid kyis rnam par shes pa gang la'ang 'dre bar mi byed de /
T02TD1803E:104b-25: 'od gsal ba nyid mngon par 'du byed cing dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1803E:104b-26: ku zhes bya ba ni bshang sar 'gro ba ste ;
T02TD1803E:104b-27: bshang ba dang gci ba 'dor ba'i phyir de tsam zhig rjes su dran par byed cing 'du 'dzi spong bar byed la /
T02TD1803E:104b-28: lus dang tshor ba dang yul dang dbang po'i ngo bo nyid la sems par mi byed do //
T02TD1803E:105a-0: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa smyon pa'i brtul zhugs bshad pa'i mdo las gsungs pa'i rim pas @105a * //
T02TD1803E:105a-2: de yi rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1803E:105a-3: gang tshe brtan par mi rtog la //
T02TD1803E:105a-4: gnas shing 'jig rten pa spangs te //
T02TD1803E:105a-5: spyod pa thams cad bsdus byas na //
T02TD1803E:105a-6: de la de tshe sangs rgyas gzigs //
T02TD1803E:105a-7: kun du the tshom gcod pa yis //
T02TD1803E:105a-8: rigs pas byis pa ji bzhin spyad ;
T02TD1803E:105a-9: / gang tshe chags med rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1803E:105a-11: sdig pa ma lus ldan pa dang //
T02TD1803E:105a-12: gti mug sdig la rab gnas na //
T02TD1803E:105a-13: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1803E:105a-14: zla ba drug gis don yod 'grub //
T02TD1803E:105a-15: rang nyid sangs rgyas kun mthong zhing //
T02TD1803E:105a-17: zad med gzhom du med pa dang //
T02TD1803E:105a-19: bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog /'bad pa med par yang dag 'thob //
T02TD1803E:105a-20: 'dod pa kun gyi dga' mos rnams //
T02TD1803E:105a-23: mchog tu zab pa'i gnas la brtag /'od gsal ye shes la mkhas pa //
T02TD1803E:105a-24: mtshan nyid rtag par rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02TD1803E:105a-25: bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD1803E:105a-26: sems kyi rin chen brtan par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:105a-27: sangs rgyas byang chub rab zhugs pa //
T02TD1803E:105a-28: byin gyi brlab pa mdzad bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:105a-29: de ltar gyur par zhugs nas kyang //
T02TD1803E:105a-30: ji srid sems ni mi skyo'i phyir //
T02TD1803E:105a-31: mnyam gzhag yid ni bzang po yis //
T02TD1803E:105a-32: de la 'bad pas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1803E:105a-33: de yi 'og tu ci dga' ba'i //
T02TD1803E:105a-34: spyod pa yis ni spyad byas nas //
T02TD1803E:105a-35: cung zad spyan phye'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1803E:105a-38: la la rab tu gar byed par //
T02TD1803E:105a-39: ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur bar //
T02TD1803E:105a-40: sgom pa'i sems la zhen par bya //
T02TD1803E:105a-41: de lta'i dam tshig ldan 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1803E:105a-42: rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis //
T02TD1803E:105a-43: dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs nas //
T02TD1803E:105a-48: na tshod dang rjes su mthun pas spyod pa rnam pa gsum zla ba phyed dam /
T02TD1803E:105a-49: zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug bzlas par 'gyur bas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'i mtshan ma nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:105b-0: de la @105b mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin no //
T02TD1803E:105b-4: yang dag pa thob pa nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:105b-5: rab tu snang ba nyid dang /
T02TD1803E:105b-9: yang rmi lam gyi mtshan ma gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02TD1803E:105b-10: byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas //
T02TD1803E:105b-11: sangs rgyas sku dang mtshungs par mthong //
T02TD1803E:105b-12: sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku //
T02TD1803E:105b-13: bdag med pa ni myur du mthong //
T02TD1803E:105b-14: sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pas //
T02TD1803E:105b-15: mchod pa byed pa des mthong ngo //
T02TD1803E:105b-16: ye shes chen po 'di yi gzugs //
T02TD1803E:105b-17: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1803E:105b-18: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis //
T02TD1803E:105b-19: rtag tu mchod pa byed pa mthong //
T02TD1803E:105b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang //
T02TD1803E:105b-21: grags chen rdo rje mchog dag tu //
T02TD1803E:105b-22: rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong //
T02TD1803E:105b-23: grags chen rdo rje gsang ba dang //
T02TD1803E:105b-24: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can //
T02TD1803E:105b-25: sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i //
T02TD1803E:105b-27: lus ngag sems kyi mthu las skyes //
T02TD1803E:105b-28: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02TD1803E:105b-29: lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang //
T02TD1803E:105b-30: khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na //
T02TD1803E:105b-31: de ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:105b-32: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad rnams //
T02TD1803E:105b-33: zhing gnas pa nges par mthong //
T02TD1803E:105b-34: thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang //
T02TD1803E:105b-35: chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol //
T02TD1803E:105b-36: chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sku //
T02TD1803E:105b-37: sems can kun gyis yongs bskor ba //
T02TD1803E:105b-38: bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1803E:105b-39: dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:105b-40: rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /
T02TD1803E:105b-41: gal te sgrub pa po bden pa mthong yang sngon byi bag chags la goms pa'i stobs kyis zhing dang /
T02TD1803E:105b-44: bsnyen bkur la sogs pas g-yengs nas spyod pa rnam pa gsum spyod pa mi byed pa dang /
T02TD1803E:105b-45: sgrub pa po gzhan dag 'byor ba ma tshang bas rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa'i chog rdzogs par byed mi nus pa'i phyir mi spyod pa de dag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas na yang srid pa gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ram /
T02TD1803E:105b-46: yang na rdo rje 'chang ba nyid thob par 'gyur /
T02TD1803E:106a-2: 'di la bsal bya gang yang med //
T02TD1803E:106a-3: gzhag par bya ba ci yang med //
T02TD1803E:106a-4: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
T02TD1803E:106a-5: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T02TD1803E:106a-6: zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i dbang du byas pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD1803E:106a-8: yang dag pa mthong ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mthong bas rtag pa dang /
T02TD1803E:106a-10: 'pho ba la sogs pa'i lta ba ngan pa 'gag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:106a-11: 'on kyang tha snyad la brten nas 'pho ba rnam par dag pa nges par spyad par bya ste /
T02TD1803E:106a-12: 'di ni phung po la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho bar mi byad de /
T02TD1803E:106a-13: rtag pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:106a-14: 'jig rten pha rol 'chi ba las gzhan pa nyid las kyang 'byung ba ma yin te /
T02TD1803E:106a-15: rgyu med pa'i nye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1803E:106a-17: mar me las mar me dang /
T02TD1803E:106a-19: sgra las brag ca dag ni de nyid dam de las gzhan pa zhes brjod par mi nus so //
T02TD1803E:106a-20: de bas na gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:106a-21: sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T02TD1803E:106a-22: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1803E:106a-23: sems can rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir //
T02TD1803E:106a-24: mya ngan 'da' bar bstan pa yin //
T02TD1803E:106a-26: lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD1803E:106a-27: 'di la gang yang rkyen rnams kyis //
T02TD1803E:106a-28: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med //
T02TD1803E:106a-29: btags pa'i rkyen rnams kho na ni //
T02TD1803E:106a-32: rigs pa 'dis na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas mdzad pa thams cad mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1803E:106a-33: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs par gyur pas kyang thams cad byas nas 'jig rten du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di la so ma nyi mi bya'o //
T02TD1803E:106a-34: de bas na de kho na nyid shes pa ni rkyen ma tshang bas ji skad du bshad pa'i spyod pa gal te ma spyad du zin kyang /
T02TD1803E:106a-35: lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin la /
T02TD1803E:106a-36: skye ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o zhes yang dag par mngon par rtogs nas brgya lam na 'od gsal bar zhugs nas /
T02TD1803E:106b-0: tha mal pa'i phung po bor nas bdag la @106b byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis ldang bar bya'o zhes brtan pa'i sems bskyed de /
T02TD1803E:106b-1: de yid la byed pas gnas par byed na /
T02TD1803E:106b-2: de skye ba gzhan du yid la byed pa de 'dor bar mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1803E:106b-3: de bas na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:106b-5: bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni //
T02TD1803E:106b-6: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1803E:106b-7: des ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:106b-8: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T02TD1803E:106b-10: de bas na 'di dag thams cad ni khyad par can du yongs su bsgyur bas yongs su 'gyur bzhin pas khyad par can gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1803E:106b-12: gang zhig skye ba kun rdzob bden zhes bya //
T02TD1803E:106b-13: 'chi ba'i ming yang don dam bden pa yin //
T02TD1803E:106b-14: rim gnyis de dag bla ma'i drin gyis ni //
T02TD1803E:106b-15: rnyed pa 'di ni ma 'ongs sangs rgyas yin //
T02TD1803E:106b-16: bden gnyis de la zung du 'jug pa ni //
T02TD1803E:106b-17: mi 'chad bzhin du de dag khyad par med //
T02TD1803E:106b-18: mi gnyis mtha' ma gcig pu kho nar ni //
T02TD1803E:106b-19: shes pa de 'dir bcings nas grol pa yin //
T02TD1803E:106b-20: ri dbang rtse las 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na //
T02TD1803E:106b-21: ltung bar mi 'dod kyang ni ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:106b-22: bla ma'i drin gyis phan pa'i lung thob na //
T02TD1803E:106b-23: grol bar mi 'dod kyang ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1803E:106b-24: 'jig rten dag na don yod gsung gi de nyid rtogs mthu 'gro ba la med de //
T02TD1803E:106b-25: mtsho chen chu la drag po'i rlung gis kun du g-yengs pa'i til mar thigs pa 'dra //
T02TD1803E:106b-26: des na bdag gis cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bsdu bar byas pa ni //
T02TD1803E:106b-27: mthar thug kun rdzob kyis 'jigs skal ldan skye bo'i blo la sgron ma lta bu yin //
T02TD1803E:106b-28: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
T02TD1803E:106b-30: // / spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma slob dpon chen po a'arya de ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1803E:106b-32: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddha ka ra warma dang /
T02TD1803E:106b-33: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
